agent: Hi, I'm Anat and I'm with you if it's convenient for you to chat now
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I was almost raped the other day
agent: It sounds like you had a scary and shocking experience, would you like to share how you feel
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I feel terrible
consumer: Really shocking
consumer: And that's someone I know
consumer: I cried for more than half an hour later
consumer: He always touches here and there but I didn't think it would come to this
consumer: he pushed me to the bed and lay on top of me and I shouted then because there were people in the building and he doesn't want rudeness he let me go
agent: Many cases of sexual assault and rape are by someone we know, it's always difficult, even if it was only almost
consu Mer: Yes
consumer: And I've already been raped several times by guys I know
agent: It's not easy to go through an experience that recreates a previous injury. And yet you reacted with resourcefulness and kept yourself.
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I have no idea how
consumer: It's awfully simple, it freezes the blood
consumer: And I cried at the central station for more than half an hour and I was frozen in place and no one came
consumer: Until a religious woman approached me and we talked
consumer: And I'm tired of men
agent: In many cases we hear about complete stagnation of the body and mind when going through such an experience. This time you chose to respond and take control into your own hands
consumer: Yes, because he let me go, so I ran away
agent: And the reaction of crying is a need to vent
consumer: Then I froze
consu Mer: Yes
consumer: So disgusting, I can't believe I hung out with him
agent: It must have felt very lonely for you to be vulnerable outside crying when no one turned to you
consumer: And always touching hands talking about sex ixsssssssssss
consumer: rejects
consumer: very yes
agent: You describe a person you don't like being in his company
consumer: No, not really
consumer: But he is part of several
consumer: But that's it, I'm done with it
consumer: From now on I will have a weapon with me no matter what
agent: It's good that you take care of yourself
Consumer: Yes
consumer: not ideal though
agent: True, but you've already experienced vulnerability and the most important thing is that you feel protected
consumer: But this is, I don't want to see this creature anymore, ugh, you don't understand how repulsive
consumer: k Let me believe it will happen
consumer: How exactly?
agent: You sound confident and that's the best way to treat yourself. No one deserves to be hurt by anyone
agent: You asked how exactly - what do you mean?
consumer: feel protected
Agent: You said you carry a weapon with you. Don't know what kind and hope you never have to use a weapon to defend yourself
consumer: from now on
consumer: I have no choice
consumer: I will never feel protected
consumer: especially from such men
consumer: I hate that I have to protect myself instead of feeling protected as a matter of course and free to act as I please
consumer: how*
agent: You can be understood, the experiences you went through according to your description are very disturbing and scary. in her You definitely deserve to feel free
consumer: I would like to feel safe and relaxed
Consumer: Yes
consumer: I wish I didn't have to defend myself. You don't understand how it feels
agent: Your ability to act while you were hurt and to say now out loud that you deserve to be relaxed and free is a virtue that exists within you and shows the inner strength that you have
consumer: I don't want to be strong 
consumer: I want to be relaxed and calm so that they don't hurt me
agent: The meaning of inner strength is to be aware of what you deserve, to allow yourself and to demand good things for yourself
agent: Some of the good things are being relaxed and calm
Consumer: Yes
agent: And the fact that you can talk about the pain and the difficulty is another quality that can ease what you are going through. It's good that you contact us and can express your wishes
consumer: yes, thank you
consumer: I have no problem talking 
If anyone is listening
agent: That's why we're here at the helpline
consumer: yes, thank you
agent: nothing to do with it
consumer: Hopefully this is the last time I have to defend myself from someone
agent: I wish. It is important to remember that such cases may come back in the form of memories and cause bad feelings later on as well. You can always contact us if this happens
consumer: ok
agent: In any case, we are here today until 11:00 p.m. (and every day between Saturday and Thursday from 5-11 p.m.) and you can also contact us by phone 1202, which is active 24/7 including weekends

consumer: היי בוקר טוב, קודם כל אני רוצה להגיד תודה רבה על האפשרות שאתם נותנים לאנשים ללא כל ידע וניסיון בנושא כמוני לפנות אליכם לסיוע. יש לי עובדת שתחתיי כבר שנתיים שחוותה תקיפה מינית לפני כ10 שנים, ויש איתה כמה בעיות שכן משליכות על העבודה שאני לא יודעת איך להתמודד איתם. חשוב לי לציין מראש שהיא העובדת הכי מקצועית שלי במשרד, בפער, ואני ממש לא רוצה לוותר עליה. (כן אני יודעת שזה קצת אינטרסנטי).
למשל, שהיא אוהבת לרוב להתבודד משאר הבנות שעובדות איתה, מדי פעם יש לה התפרצויות וכעסים שממש לא נורמלים ביחס לסיטואציות שקרו, יש לה בעיות של שליטת יתר עד כדי כך שלא נותנת לאף אחד להתערב לה בעבודה, ואיתי כמעסיקה שלה- יש לה קצת עניין בלקבל את הסמכות שלי ונוטה לבטל החלטות ולהתנגד לרצונות שלי. בעקבות מה שעברה אני לא יודעת איך להתנהל איתה מבלי לפגוע בה, ואני מנסה להיות איתה עדינה אפילו ייתר על המידה. אשמח לדעת מה לעשות במצב כזה.

consumer: Hi good morning, first of all I want to say thank you very much for the opportunity you give to people without any knowledge and experience on the subject like me to contact you for assistance. I have an employee who has been under me for two years who experienced sexual assault about 10 years ago, and she has some problems with her that are affecting the work that I don't know how to deal with. It is important for me to state in advance that she is the most professional employee in my office, by far, and I really do not want to give her up. (Yes, I know it's a bit self-interested).
For example, that she often likes to isolate herself from the other girls who work with her, occasionally she has outbursts and anger that are really abnormal in relation to situations that have happened, she has problems of overcontrol to the point that she does not let anyone interfere with her work, and with me as a Her Sika- she has some interest in accepting my authority and tends to overrule decisions and oppose my wishes. After what she went through, I don't know how to deal with her without hurting her, and I try to be even more gentle with her. I would love to know what to do in such a situation.
Consumer: No

Hi good morning, first of all I want to say thank you very much for the opportunity you give to people without any knowledge and experience on the subject like me to contact you for assistance. I have an employee who has been under me for two years who experienced sexual assault about 10 years ago, and she has some problems with her that are affecting the work that I don't know how to deal with. It is important for me to state in advance that she is the most professional employee in my office, by far, and I really do not want to give her up. (Yes, I know it's a bit self-interested).
For example, that she often likes to isolate herself from the other girls who work with her, occasionally she has outbursts and anger that are really not normal in relation to situations that have happened, she has problems of overcontrol to the point that she does not let anyone interfere with her work, and with me as her employer- She has little interest in accepting my authority and tends to overrule decisions and oppose my wishes. After what she went through, I don't know how to deal with her without hurting her, and I try to be even more gentle with her. I would love to know what to do in such a situation.

agent: feeling overwhelmed by many things happening at the same time
agent: Maybe your body is asking for some kind of sedation
consumer: I just want it to stop
Agent: Me too Want it to stop for you because it really is too much. We will have to recruit you for breathing or something relaxing that can help you first here and now, is that okay with you?
Consumer: Yes

agent: take air in through the nose and count to 4, then take air out of the mouth very slowly and count to 5
agent: four times like this and let the shoulders go down

consumer: I feel like someone else is controlling my body and I have no control over anything I can't do anything I really, really, really try

agent: Excellent, let the treatment run over your face, pat, try to follow them
agent: where are you right now?

agent: what are you sitting on?

agents: Are you barefoot or wearing shoes?

agent: is this your room?

agent: You are barefoot on the carpet, the air conditioner is working but hot, you recognize that it is not your room
consumer: Why isn't it over?

agent: You would like it to be quieter
agent: I hope you are calm and maybe you fell asleep in the end. The shift is about to end. I understand that you cannot continue chatting right now and I am saying goodbye to you. גם וגם אממ לא יודעת איך לכתוב את זה

מעבר לזה להציף כל כך הרבה פגיעות..

כן היא עשתה בדיקה מקיפה לפני שאנחנו הולכות לפגישה הראשונה.. ועדיין..
זה מפחיד
אני יכולה לכתוב לך משהו שלא קשור?
לא.. מאמא אין פחד.. איתה בחיים לא אפגע..
לפני שבועיים בערך התעלפתי (אני מתעלפת כרונית) ודפקתי את הראש בבטון מאז יד שמאל שלי לא מתפקדת.. אני במלא בדיקות והכל אבל זה גם מלחית אותי..

יש לי סינקופה.. שזה התעלפויות..

יש לי כאבים מטורפים בראש ובצוואר..
אין לי תחושה ביד ואני לא יכולה להזיז אותה בכלל
לא אותה משפחה..ולא לא משתמשים במשככי כאבים בבית..
מאז שעברתי למשפחה הזאת(אני גרה עכשיו בבנין מתחתנם) אבל נמצאת אצלהם רוב היום בעיקר עכשיו עם היד...  אז אני לא יכולה להשתמש יותר באדוויל וכו
משתמשים פה רק בדברים טבעיים.. מבחינת אמא אדוויל זה סמים
אז כרגע שוכבת עם קומפרסים על הראש ומתמודדת עם הכאב
הייתי מפרקת חבילות של אדוויל.. ממש מוזר לא להשתמש בזה יותר.. יש כל מני שמנים ודברים טביעים שהיא רוקחת שאפשר תמיד למרוח/לקחת
אבל בגלל שהיא לא יודעת מה יש בראש שלי אז בנתיים היא לא מוכנה שאקח כלום.. עד שיהיה תשובה מה זה.. למה היד לא מתפקדת
אוף היא הרגע אמרה לאח שלי שהיא חוזרת מאוחר היום הביתה..
כן.. במחזור אני הכי סובלת.. אבל אפילו שההינו בבית חולים אחרי המכה בראש אמרתי שאני לא רוצה משככי כאבים ואמא הייתה ממש בשוק חחח
לפעמים
אני מרגישה ממש רע עכשיו זה כל כך מתסכל להרגיש ככה.. גם פיזית וגם נפשית
כי לפעמים אני מעלה לה את כל העצבים חחח.. אבל זה בגלל שהיא אוהבת אותי..
אתמול הכנתי לעצמי תה קר ושהיא קלטה את כמות הסוכר שיש בפנים היא פשוט שפכה לי את זה לכיור
זו הסיבה העיקרית שנכנסתי לכן היום..
בשביל לנסות לא לחשוב.. ולא לפחד
כן יש תחושה שאני לא לבד עכשיו..
למרות שאח שלי הקטן והמתוק כל כמה זמן שואל אם אני בסד.. נראלי עשיתי לו טראומה
כולם פה דואגים לי.. אני איתם כבר כמעט שנה והפכתי לבת בית לכל דבר.. שזה מוזר
כי מעולם לא הייתה לי באמת משפחה.. כאילו יש לי את המשפחה הביולוגית שלי.. אבל נפגעתי שם כל כך הרבה.. מעולם לא דאגו לי ככה.. מעולם לא אהבתי ככה אנשים והם אהבו אותי
ממש.. תביני שהכרתי אותה משום מקום בצורה אנונימית בפייסבוק.. והיא התיע לי עזרה מלא פעמים וסירבתי כי לא ידעתי מי היא עד שסבוף היא שיכמעה אותי להגיע אליהם.. ואז הבת הגדולה שלה שכנעה אותי להשאר לישון ומאז אני אצלהם..
אחרי תקופה ארוכה הדירה מתחתהם התפנתה ושכרתי אותה..אז יש לי דירה ממש מתחתהם.. אבל כרגע אני ישנה על הספה אצלהם.. בעיקר בגלל היד וההתעלפויות..היא מפחדת שאשן לבד..
הם לא יודעים
26
בת כמה חשבת?
אמרו לי את זה מאז שאני בת 13 שאני בוגרת לגילי
זה נשמע מוזר אבל אני חושבת שהפגיעות הן אלה שביגרו אותי... הפעם הראשונה שנפגעתי הייתי בת 9...
רק בגיל 13 הבנתי את זה..המשפחה הביולוגית שלי דתיה..
ישר אחרי השירות עזבתי את הבית ועשיתי הכל בשביל לבנות את עצמי והיה לי ממש טוב עד גיל 25 שחזרתי להיפגע והתפרקתי.. ואז הכרתי את אמא..
הייתה תקופה שניסיתי לשאול למה זה קורה לי.. שכל כך שנאתי את עצמי.. שלא הבנתי מה יש בי.. כאילו נפגעתי מיותר מדי אנשים בעיקר בילדות..אין לי מספיק אצבעות לספור אותם.. וכאילו הרבה זמן ניסיתי להבין מה עשיתי לא בסדר.. ויש עוד פעמים שאני מאשימה את עצמי
במוח אני מבינה בלב לא תמיד.. זה משהו שאמא אומרת תמיד.. שאני לא אדמה.. אבל זה קשה לפעמים לקבל את זה.. כמה פעמים בגיל 9 הלכתי אחרי הפוגע שהוא קרה לי ונפגעתי.. כמה פעמים פשוט שתקתי.. כמה פעמים בגיל 10 נשארתי לישון בבית שפוגע בי..וכו..
בעיקר מהמשפחה...אפאחד לא אומר לך שאנשים שאמורים לאהוב אותך יכאיבו לך
לגמרי...אוף נראלי שאני צריכה להקיא
הקאתי.. הראש מתפוצץ

חחח
את מאמינה שכל מה שקורה לנו אמור לקרות לנו?
אני מנסה.. אני כל כך מקווה לא לטעות..
אני יודעת..
אם זה בסדר אני אשמח כי ממש  לא מתחשק לי להיות לבד..אבל אם יש עומס או משהו כזה אני לא רוצה לקחת מקום של מישהי אחרת

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, 
I was sexually assaulted (rape) 
I want to consult
consumer: Hello
consumer: I want to consult on whether to file a complaint
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: Good evening
Agent: Hi
consumer: I was raped two weeks ago in Be'er Sheva
I don't live there anymore
I want to file a complaint just to prevent further attacks, but:
Don't want to see the attacker anymore
I have no proof (happened in an isolated apartment) and I'm afraid they won't believe me
I don't want to go back to Be'er Sheva anymore (not for discussions, not for testimonies, not for anything)
The attacker is very connected in the city and I am afraid that he will have a way to influence the investigation if it happens
consumer: I wanted to know if I can request during the filing of the complaint that I not be subpoenaed except for the delivery of the evidence In the police for nothing more?
consumer: to do the right thing and close this thing behind me
consumer: And do you have help with rehabilitation/psychological support for the victim(s)?
consumer: Even those who don't file a complaint?
agent: sounds terrible. Hold your hands and regret that you went through this
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: I don't have all the answers to your questions, but I can forward them to our legal coordinator if you'd like and she'll get back to you with answers
consumer: I would be very happy
agent: For this purpose, please write down your name and your phone number and which area of ​​the country you are from so that I can direct you to the appropriate hub. I will consult with my coordinator whether to refer you to Beer Sheva where the event was or to your area (if it is not Beer Sheva), but in any case If a complaint is filed, it will be filed in Be'er Sheva
consumer: Aviya Ohion
0523943432
Eilat / Jerusalem (parents are from Jerusalem, I moved to Eilat)
consumer: Can you answer that for me?
agent: Thank you, father. I will forward your details to the coordinator and she will get back to you in the next few days. It is important that you know that she will call from a confidential line and ask if you are free to talk, and if it does not suit you at that moment, you can ask her to get back to you at another time.
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: I understand you are a resident of Eilat today? In Eilat, there is a city assistance center, which is not related to us, and is actually open 24 hours a day by phone at 055-7557331. I suggest that you contact them, assuming that they will be able to give you information about the possibilities in the area
consumer: Thank you very much!
agent: And this is the number of the line Assistance in Jerusalem if you want to contact them, which is also active 24 hours 02-6255558
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: Thank you for reaching out, that's what we're here for.
Sending you lots of strength to continue

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, I have a confrontation scheduled for this Wednesday
I would love to hear about the process, what questions are going to be asked, how it goes, etc
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I see you contacted us earlier about a confrontation on Wednesday. I'm here if it suits you to talk
consumer: Hi, I would love to hear about the process and what questions the judge can ask
agent: In a confrontation you are sitting in front of the attacker and this is your opportunity to slap him with everything that happened when you are in a safe place. There must be agreement from both parties to carry out a confrontation
agent: You think you will be able to stand up to the attacker
agent: Would you like us to continue talking?
consumer: I don't feel like I'm ready for it, but I know it's the right thing to do, I need to prepare somehow and be assertive and blunt Ha in my words
consumer: Are we alone there? Can my social worker join me? Are there certain rules?
consumer: Is it possible to get up and walk in the middle?
agent: I have some important things to tell you
agent: If you feel that the confrontation may cause you trauma and you decide not to carry it out in the end, it is important to request that the reason for the refusal be recorded
agent: of course there is an advantage to carrying out the confrontation if you have the forces because it shows cooperation with the police and enables the collection of additional evidence
agent: From the experience we have, the confrontation can be an empowering experience because of the opportunity to say what you have to the attacker
agent: Regarding accompanying the escort, she can be with you until the moment of entering the hall, it is not certain that she will be allowed to enter
agent: about getting up And to go in the middle I don't know how to say. Without your cooperation it will be difficult to continue and the case may be closed on the other hand as soon as the investigation has begun the police are allowed to continue conducting it even without the complainant
agent: At the assistance centers, you can consult with a legal coordinator if you want. The point is that Wednesday is really, really close. I don't know if they will have time to get back to you.
agent: If it is important to you to try to get guidance from the legal coordinator, I suggest you call 1202 tomorrow morning and explain that you are facing a confrontation and need some guidance
agent: In a few minutes my shift will end, I hope I was able to help you and I wish you success in the confrontation.
consumer: Thank you very much for the help!
agent: Feel free to contact us whenever you need

transcriptAll: agent: בוקר טוב רוואד, מה שלומך? זו שוב ענבל ממרכז הסיוע. אני מתנצלת שחלף זמן מאז הודעתך האחרונה. על מנת שהתקשורת ביננו תהיה יותר רציפה, אני מציעה שנתאם שעה שבה אתה יכול לשוחח טלפונית ואוכל לתת לך את כל המידע לגבי ביטוח לאומי. קח בחשבון שאני לא נמצאת בווטסאפ כל הזמן, אז אם לא נצליח לתאם שיחה טלפונית, אני מציעה שתתקשר לקו הסיוע 1202, שזמין 24 שעות ותבקש שמות של פסיכיאטרים בהתאם לקופת החולים שבה אתה נמצא. המתנדבת שעל הקו תדע לתת לך.
transcriptAll_en: agent: Good morning Rawad, how are you? This is Inbal again from the aid center. I apologize that it has been a while since your last message. In order for the communication between us to be more continuous, I suggest that we arrange a time when you can talk on the phone and I can give you all the information about social security. Keep in mind that I'm not on WhatsApp all the time, so if we can't arrange a phone conversation, I suggest you call the 1202 helpline, which is available 24 hours a day, and ask for the names of psychiatrists according to the health fund you're in. The volunteer on the line will know how to give it to you.

Consumer: Yes
Agent: Good evening
I am here with you
consumer: hi, what's going on?
Agent: Hi
consumer: I'm looking for a friend who lives in Tel Aviv - do you have female volunteers who have a personal background in sexual assault and can sit down for a conversation? She needs someone to talk to and really prefers someone with experience. She goes to psychological treatment at the same time, so it is not necessary to replace it
agent: Hi, of course she can make an appointment and talk with one of the volunteers at an aid center in Tel Aviv. 
Regarding the personal background of female volunteers - I don't think it's something that can be asked for and inquired about.
All volunteers are trained and experienced in talking to applicants who have been sexually abused, can understand and support.
You can reach Mr Tel Aviv Assistance If you dial 1202 when you are in the Tel Aviv area, or the direct phone number of the Tel Aviv Assistance Center is 03-5176176.
Their email is: Supervision@ta1202.org
consumer: Is it not possible to request a personal background? It has a lot of value in accompaniment
consumer: Her psychologist provides an answer with treatment training, but she really needs someone with experience :/
agent: You are welcome to ask the aid center in Tel Aviv, but I am not sure that this is information they will be able to give because of the protection of the privacy of volunteers
consumer: Okay, I'll talk to them
consumer: Thank you
agent: perfectly fine
I just want to say that I'm really happy that your friend has you, and that you try to help and take care of her. This is very important and significant
consumer: Thank you

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: When will it be possible to talk?
Agent: Hello. i am with you
consumer: I don't know what to do! I'm sure I'm not normal!!! I'm now on an intercity bus and I'm having a small anxiety attack, just because I'm scared... for no reason, and don't tell me to go to a psychologist because it didn't help me!
agent: I understand that you are anxious now, but you don't understand why
consumer: Bingo!
agent: You are alone on the bus
consumer: with just people I don't know
agent: And you are afraid of the situation
consumer: Yes, for no reason!
agent: What helps you calm yourself from anxiety?
consumer: Nothing, I'm waiting for it to pass
agent: And it usually passes?
consumer: after ten, twenty minutes
agent: do you feel better now?
consumer: a little Better, but terribly afraid!
agent: I understand that you are still very scared. are you still on the bus
Consumer: Yes
agent: There are other people on the bus. Will it help you to sit close to the driver?
consumer: I'll be coming down soon
consumer: But I'm afraid of every moment
agent: are you afraid to go down?
consumer: Not exactly, but every second on the bus scares me
consumer: Leave it is absurd
agent: It's your feeling. It's not absurd
consumer: good
consumer: so what?
agent: You are currently afraid, and looking for a way to overcome this fear
consumer: So what can help?
agent: Treatment by someone professional can help
consumer: But I was and it didn't help...
agent: I understand that sometimes it doesn't help. It is important to find a therapist that is right for you
consumer: ok i will try
consumer: Thank you
agent: I'm here until 11 tonight, and I'm free to talk if you want
consumer: every day?
agent: Every weekday there is someone here from 17:00-23:00
consumer: The truth is, I'm afraid to ask for help
agent: We are here to listen and give you the opportunity to share
consumer: Thank you
agent: I understand that you cannot continue chatting right now. I'm breaking up with you at this point. The WhatsApp line is available tonight until 23.00 or tomorrow from 17.00

consumer: Hello, I would like to know if it is possible through you to get recommendations for therapists who are qualified to work with victims?
consumer: I am looking for a marriage and sexual therapist for me and my partner who will help us deal with the complexities of the harm
agent: Good evening, for this purpose you should talk to the assistance coordinator
agent: In order to direct you to the assistance center that will best meet your needs, I wanted to let you know that there are regional assistance centers nationwide, as well as an assistance center for religious women or Arab women. I would love for you to tell me what suits you best and I can give you their contact information
consumer: Hi, so just contact Tair? I am in contact with them due to her request for a support package. I just wanted to know if it is possible at all to have such recommendations from you Because I don't need subsidized treatment and am looking for treatment through private channels
consumer: And Tsama Tair's operating hours? Because I know that in the evening when you contact them it refers to the general helpline
Agent: I understand. The aid centers have accurate information on trauma-oriented therapists, not only at subsidized costs.
agent: Regarding hours, I'm checking
consumer: Thank you!
agent: working hours. I think it's up to four. What is worthwhile is to send an email and then you are not dependent on the hours. You can request by email that the assistance coordinator get back to you.
consumer: Okay, great, I don't have their email address, I'd be happy to
agent: The direct phone number of the Tair Assistance Center (in Rehovot) is 08-9496020.
Their email is: manager@tair1202.org
consumer: Thank you Great!
Agent: With pleasure. I hope there will be a quick response and you will find an accurate therapist.

Hello, I would like to know if it is possible through you to receive recommendations for therapists who are qualified to work with victims?
I am looking for a marriage and sexual therapist for me and my partner who will help us deal with the complexities of the injury
Hi, so just contact Tair? I am in contact with them due to her request for a support package. I just wanted to know if it is possible to have such recommendations from you, since I do not need subsidized treatment and am looking for treatment through private channels

Okay, great, I don't have their email address, I'd love to
Thank you!

רציתי לדעת איזה עוד אופציות קיימות, טיפול יותר בזול ואולי קבוצות תמיכה כלשהן?

היי, מקווה שתוכלו לעזור. אני פונה בקשר לבת הזוג שלי, לפני כמה שנים היא נזכרה במקרה שהיה עם אבא שלה כשהיא הייתה קטנה, ומאז היא מתמודדת עם זה די לבד. אבא שלה נפטר ב2018, לאח שלה ולאמא שלה אין מושג, ובעקבות זה הם לא מבינים את ההתנהגות המרוחקת שלה וכועסים עליה. אני רואה כמה זה משפיע על ההתנהגויות שלה ואני רוצה לעזור אבל לא יודעת איך. היא הלכה כמה פעם לפסיכולוגית שמתמחה בסיטואציות כאלה, אבל בגלל שזה יקר היא הפסיקה כרגע. 
רציתי לדעת איזה עוד אופציות קיימות, טיפול יותר בזול ואולי קבוצות תמיכה כלשהן?

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, hope you can help. I am contacting about my partner, a few years ago she remembered an incident with her father when she was little, and since then she has been dealing with it quite alone. Her father passed away in 2018, her brother and mother have no idea, and as a result they do not understand her distant behavior and are angry with her. I see how much it affects her behaviors and I want to help but don't know how. She went several times to a psychologist who specializes in such situations, but because it is expensive she has stopped for now. 
I wanted to know what other options exist, cheaper treatment and maybe any support groups? 
Thanks in advance
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I'm with you now
consumer: Hi, good evening, thank you. you see a What I wrote in the first message?
Agent: Yes.
agent: It is best to contact the assistance coordinator at an assistance center near you and consult about trauma-oriented therapists. The coordinator will also know about additional options that could lower the cost. If you can tell me a residential area I will direct you to the nearest center.
consumer: Tel Aviv or Petah Tikva area
consumer: Thank you
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Tel Aviv is 03-5176176.
Their email is: Supervision@ta1202.org
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Ra'anana is 09-7747760.
Their email is: withu@1202sharon.org.il
agent: You should call tomorrow morning during business hours or leave an email regarding the issue and they will get back to you. good luck. If you don't find A response invites you to turn here again in the evening (17:00-23:00) and we will try to help
consumer: Yes, I sent an email. 
Thank you
Agent: Please. Hope a good nanny is found soon.
agent: I'm hanging up now. Successfully.
agent: If you need anything else, the WhatsApp line is available tonight until 11:00 p.m. or tomorrow from 5:00 p.m.

consumer: Hello to the help center... I have a bit of a strange question. I am a member of an informal organization, and someone, a distant friend/colleague of this organization attacked several women in our space... we asked him to stay away, but I also think he needs help to get out of this behavior. Someone told me that a support center might have support groups (or support groups) for male abusers? Something that can move them through the process? I think he will go if there is such a thing, but he himself will not pick up the phone to you to find out right now
agent: Hello, I'm Ruth. here with you now to talk
consumer: Hi Ruth
consumer: so like that
consumer: I have a somewhat strange question. Someone told me that a support center might have support groups (or support groups) for male abusers? Something that can move them through the process? I think he will go if there is such a thing, but he himself will not pick up the phone to you to find out right now
agent: It sounds like you are caring towards the friend/colleague and understand that a person who hurts may also be hurt himself
consumer: mmmm thank you? I also talked to him, I know he was upset with what happened and how it turned out. And that he is willing to take real steps to break this habit
consumer: Is there anything you can refer him to? Is there a defined process?
consumer: We are in Tel A Bib if it matters
agent: I will offer some options from which to start checking directions
agent: First, you can directly contact the assistance center in Tel Aviv and check with them if there are any relevant groups
agent: From your words I understand that this is a person who offends repeatedly and that it is a pattern. It may imply addiction and there are groups in Israel that deal with this issue specifically
consumer: Ok, I'll check with them
consumer: In my understanding it is not related to addiction
consumer: are there other options?
agent: I want to say again that your sensitivity is very appreciated and important. Everyone can stumble, and when there are people like you around, who don't let it get worse, it's a life-changing move
agent: Of course you can always turn to individual treatment. It Can be through the health insurance fund or privately
consumer: I understand. Thank you very much for the help, I will try to continue from here
agent: How do you feel in this incident in front of the friend?
consumer: Thanks for the question, but really I came today only for the technical information of where to refer the friend
consumer: I will contact the assistance center in Tel Aviv, and see what can be done from there
consumer: Thanks for the help and all the best!
Agent: Nice. Successfully

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, I wanted to know if you have a recommendation for a breast surgeon who is sensitive to the issue of trauma in general?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hello, this is Ruth. I saw that earlier you asked for a recommendation for a female doctor
consumer: Right, do you have any way to help?
agent: The desire to contact a doctor who is sensitive to this issue is so understandable and correct
agent: I wish all doctors were sensitive to trauma in advance and treated accordingly
agent: We have less information about specific female doctors and it also very much depends on your area of ​​residence. I suggest you try checking in regional information groups, such as local women's groups on Facebook
agent: I understand that you cannot continue chatting right now. I'm breaking up with you at this point. The WhatsApp line is available tonight Until 23.00 or tomorrow from 17.00
consumer: Thank you
agent: I wish you luck and if you do find such a doctor, share so that more women can know. This is really very important information. If there is anything else I can help with, I'm here until 8:00 p.m. and there is an answer on WhatsApp tonight until 11:00 p.m. or tomorrow from 5:00 p.m.
consumer: It hurts me that the trauma will never go away 
That I will have to continue to live with it always
consumer: It feels like a prison
agent: The prison experience is shared by many women who have been sexually assaulted. What happened cannot be changed, but you can act to live with it in a more positive way
consumer: I'm trying
And I am already functioning and have a full life
But every free moment I have it comes back to me 
I'm afraid to be alone, afraid to be and with myself without occupying myself with anything
I'm tired of myself
agent: It's wonderful to hear that you have a full life and are functioning. It is exciting. However, the felt does lurk around the corner. When you are in difficult moments, it is important to have someone you can turn to and share with. You can of course also contact us. The 1202 helpline is available 24/7 so you are never alone. This is not a password. We are truly here to listen, support and assist.
consumer: Thank you
It sure helps to know you're there
agent: Women like you who turn and participate allow us to continue to open our hearts and help. Thank you

Thanks

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello,
I am contacting you because two years ago I was sexually assaulted right after I left a toxic relationship in which I also experienced humiliation and sometimes sexual exploitation.  
Until now, I didn't take care of it because I didn't know how and I was also busy with the bachelor's degree that I am now finishing. 
But in the last year I feel that what I went through is taking over and making it difficult for me to function properly. I think I'm experiencing depression.  
I went to a psychologist through the cash register and he recommended that I go to welfare to get comprehensive treatment. But I can't understand from the website how to start the process..
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hello, I'm Ruth. I saw you turned in earlier. Is it okay for you to talk now?
consumer: Yes, but I would like it to be via WhatsApp because I don't have reception on WhatsApp Yat
Agent: Yes. you can write me
consumer: I wrote more or less here
agent: I understand that you are uncertain how to act
consumer: I feel that in the last year I can no longer bear it. I am constantly depressed, experiencing a deep unexplained sorrow, a feeling of emptiness and constant anxiety, and I do not stop thinking and dreaming about everything I have been through. It's hard for me to function in my studies, I only have to finish my dissertation in my degree and I can't function, think, and deal with it. And in general, I feel that I am unable to pick myself up and function even in the things of life itself, such as household chores, looking for a job, and getting pleasure out of nothing. Even from things that used to fill me up and do me good, I'm not saved Have fun. I am already helpless and do not know what to do with all this
agent: You describe feelings that are very typical for women who have been sexually assaulted
agent: It sounds like you are already taking steps in the right direction, such as contacting a psychologist
agent: And I understand from your words that you need guidance
agent: I would be happy to help you in thinking together
consumer: I am currently unemployed
agent: It sounds like you would like to work
consumer: It sounds like the answer I'm getting here is robotic
agent: I'm sorry if that's how you feel. I'm not really a robot. I'm really trying to think along with you. Give me a chance and tell me a little more, so I can help
agent: And what a shame that we are in a time when we are not sure if there is a real man/woman on the other side of the keyboard or robot
agent: I understand that you cannot continue chatting right now. I'm breaking up with you at this point. The WhatsApp line is available tonight until 23.00 or tomorrow from 17.00

transcriptAll:
consumer: היי
שמי רועי, שוכר דירה בקיבוץ בחוף הכרמל. 
אני וחברה טובה (שכנה) מרכזים פניות של חדירה לפרטיות וגם ניסיון אונס לצערנו בקיבוץ ובדיוק עומדים לנסוע עוד שעה למשטרת זכרון לבדוק האם הם מטפלים בתלונות שהגשנו לפני חודש. בערב יש לנו פגישה מול ״הממונה על הטרדות בקיבוץ״ אך אני חושד שלא מטפלים פה בתלונות כמו שצריך וגם העברת המידע בין הגורמים פה לוקה בחסר ממש. 
אם יש מי שיכולה לנהל שיחה איתי ועם חברתי בקרוב נשמח להכוונה
consumer: כן
agent: הי רועי, תודה ששיתפת בעשייה הכל כך חשובה שלקחת על עצמך. זה לא מובן מאליו וגם לא קל כחוויה אישית. אנחנו כאן גם כדי לתמוך במעגלים התומכים בנפגעות והנפגעים וטוב שפנית אלינו. תרצה לשתף לגבי מה שהיה היום או בכלל מה שעובר עליך
consumer: תודה רבה, אני וחברה בשם ליהי מרכזים את הטיפול וצירפנו אלינו את אחת החברות שנפגעו (לא בחדירה לביתה שזה חשד לניסיון אונס כמו שכנה אחרת אלא בהצצה למקלחת ביתה) וביחד הלכנו למשטרה וגילינו שסגרו את התיק שלה. הסברנו על ריבוי המקרים ודרשנו טיפול מקיף ויסודי יותר כי אפ לא אנחנו נקח את החוק לידיים ונחקור ונתפוס את הבחור. 
קבעתי להערב עוד פגישה, הפעם עם הממונה על הטרדות בקיבוץ וממנה ננסה להבין כיצד יש מצב שהיא לא יודעת כלום על המקרים האחרונים וכיצד רכז הבטחון והשוטר האיזורי לא מעבירים אליה מידע. משהו חייב להשתנות. במקביל ננסה להתקין מצלמות בקרוב כדי שיהיו ראיות ושנוכל לתפוס את הבחור ולמנוע מנשים נוספות להפגע ממנו. סה״כ המקרים בשנתיים האחרונות בשכונה שלנו הם 7 מקרים של הצצות שאנחנו יודעים עליהם מתוכם שניים בהם הוא ניסה להכנס לבית של בחורה באמצע הלילה
agent: נשמע שזו בעיה של כל הקהילה ואתה לקחת על עצמך את האחריות. זה ראוי להערכה. מעבר לעניין הביטחון האישי שאתה מטפל בו יש מקום ליידע את הנפגעות באפשרות ליצור קשר עם מרכז הסיוע כדי שיוכלו לדבר על החוויה שעברו (אם הן ירצו כמובן)
agent: אני מבינה שאין באפשרותך לשוחח כרגע. אני נפרדת ממך בשלב הזה. קו הווטסאפ זמין הערב עד שעה 23.00 או מחר משעה 17.00 ואפשר גם להתקשר לקו הטלפוני במספר 1202 שפעיל 24/7

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
My name is Roy, I rent an apartment in a kibbutz on the Carmel beach. 
Me and a good friend (neighbor) handle requests for invasion of privacy and also attempted rape unfortunately in the kibbutz and are just about to drive another hour to the Zichron police station to see if they handle the complaints we filed a month ago. In the evening we have a meeting with "the person in charge of harassment in the kibbutz" but I suspect that complaints are not handled properly here and the transfer of information between the parties here is really lacking. 
If there is anyone who can have a conversation with me and my friend soon, we will be happy for guidance
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi Roy, thank you for sharing in such an important undertaking that you have undertaken. It is not obvious nor is it easy as a personal experience. We are also here to support the circles that support the victims and the injured and well You contacted us. You would like to share about what happened today or in general what you are going through
consumer: Thank you very much, a friend named Leahy and I are coordinating the treatment and we included one of the friends who was injured (not in breaking into her house which is a suspicion of attempted rape like another neighbor but in peeking into the shower of her house) and together we went to the police and found out that her case was closed. We explained the large number of cases and demanded a more comprehensive and thorough treatment because otherwise we will take the law into our hands and investigate and catch the guy. 
I scheduled another meeting for tonight, this time with the supervisor for harassment at the kibbutz and from her we will try to understand how there is a situation where she knows nothing about the recent cases and how the security coordinator and the regional policeman do not pass on information to her. something has to change. At the same time we will try to install Cameras soon so that there will be evidence and that we can catch the guy and prevent more women from harming him. In total, the cases in the last two years in our neighborhood are 7 cases of peeping that we know of, of which two were when he tried to enter a girl's house in the middle of the night
agent: It sounds like this is a problem for the whole community and you took the responsibility. It is worthy of appreciation. In addition to the matter of personal safety that you are dealing with, there is a place to inform the victims of the possibility of contacting the assistance center so that they can talk about the experience they had (if they want of course)
agent: I understand you are unable to chat at the moment. I'm breaking up with you at this point. The WhatsApp line is available tonight until 23.00 or tomorrow from 17.00 and you can also call the phone line at R 1202 which is active 24/7

transcriptAll:
agent: בוקר טוב, שמי ענבל ואני רכזת הסיוע במרכז הסיוע חיפה. אני חוזרת אליך בעניין מיצוי הזכויות בביטוח לאומי. הדבר הראשון שצריך לעשות הוא לקבוע תור לפסיכיאטר ולבקש חוות דעת לצורך ביטוח לאומי. אם תכתוב באיזה קופת חולים אתה, אוכל להמליץ על פסיכיאטרים.
agent: ברגע שתהיה לך חוות דעת, אפשר להגיש את התביעה דרך האינטרנט
agent: אני מבינה שאתה לא זמין לשיחה בלי תיאום מראש, ולכן אני מציעה שתחייג לקו הסיוע 1202 שזמין עבורך 24 שעות ושם תוכל לקבל פרטים. אם אתה מעדיף קו שגברים עונים בו, אתה יכול להתקשר 1203. ישנו גם קו לגוברי ערבית 04-6566813.
agent: לגבי המלצה על פסיכיאטרים, אם תרצה, תוכל להתקשר לקו סיוע ולבקש שמות של פסיכיאטרים. אנחנו פה כדי לעזור בכל מה שתצטרך
transcriptAll_en:
agent: Good morning, my name is Inbal and I am the aid coordinator at the Haifa Aid Center. I am coming back to you regarding the exhaustion of rights in the National Insurance. The first thing to do is make an appointment with a psychiatrist and ask for an opinion for the purpose of social insurance. If you write which health fund you are in, I can recommend psychiatrists.
agent: Once you have an opinion, you can file the claim online
agent: I understand that you are not available for a call without an appointment, so I suggest that you call the 1202 helpline which is available for you 24 hours and there you can get details. If you prefer a line answered by men, you can call 1203. There is also a line for Arabic men 04-6566813.
agent: Regarding a recommendation for psychiatrists, if you want, you can call a helpline and Ask for names of psychiatrists. We are here to help with anything you need

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I'm Anat and I'm with you if it's convenient for you to talk now
consumer: Hi
consumer: I have been raped and sexually assaulted in recent years
The first was from a relative at the age of 16
consumer: The first injury was repressed for about 7 years
consumer: Because no one believed me
consumer: Wow, sorry, I even forgot to say thank you for being with me because I'm full
agent: It sounds like you went through a long period of life with pain and loneliness. It is not easy to carry the vulnerability alone without being believed
consumer: I had to forgive and give up.. because there was no other way
consumer: To this day I am forbidden to tell that such a thing happened in the family
consumer: Really lonely and a lot of pain alone
And still going through a lot
a gent: It's good that you allow yourself to express and talk about it with us on the helpline
consumer: For some reason I prefer it to be alone... I got tired of waiting for other people's reactions
consumer: It's really, really a rescue 
consumer: The first one was from my brother.. It's still hard for me to digest
agent: Choosing to cross the road alone can be a form of self-defense
consumer: Because I was hurt a lot by people
consumer: But on the other hand it's also literally living on the edge
consumer: I was by your side in the complex post-trauma ward
agent: You can understand the difficulty in trusting people. Mainly in light of the fact that the person who hurt you first was the closest person in the family
consumer: I didn't even know it was an injury.. I always had this doubt, whether it was an injury or not
c onsumer: It was hard for me to digest, and I also had to do a lot by myself
agent: This happens many times when there is confusion between proximity and damage
consumer: Yes, it's hard..
consumer: I wanted to ask.. since the vulnerability 
I had, among other things, complex post-traumatic stress disorder
consumer: I wanted to ask if it's okay to ask - if it makes sense that I have obsessive thoughts about the subject
consumer: I really suffer from it..
consumer: I really don't want it
consumer: and I feel that it was forced on me
agent: It's natural, there are times when the trauma erupts and then it's hard to stop thinking about what happened and the difficulty doesn't leave us and sometimes it manages to calm down
consumer: In normal treatment, there's no way I could share something like that because of the shame
agent: ashamed of your feelings or b And what happened to you
consumer: Maybe I already have ocd from the fear of this?
consumer: I'm also ashamed of what happened to me, I will never be able to share like here that one of the abusers is a relative
consumer: and shame on my thoughts
agent: There are many psychological definitions and different levels of dealing with trauma, only a professional will be able to diagnose what you are going through. But from our acquaintances in the help line with many victims, this is a natural thing that repeats itself in many cases
consumer: At the level that I'm already getting down on myself.. that I'm bad and disgusting.. I'm disgusted with myself
agent: And the difficulty of expressing out loud the fact that your brother hurt you is natural
consumer: I feel violated and I'm not like that, I think. ..
At least not one that looks like this 
consumer: Yes, I'm afraid to have done it
consumer: This is another cage like that... but I have no choice, I don't want to hurt him
agent: It sounds like you are very aware of your situation, you know that you are like everyone else, but inside you feel that you have committed a crime, therefore you feel disgusted by the thoughts and the preoccupation with injury and pain
consumer: I thought about going to a professional, but I'm ashamed and really suffering
agent: There are professional women who focus on sexual injuries, maybe with someone like that you will feel more comfortable
consumer: It could be, it could be this suppression of vulnerability.. and what comes to the front of the thoughts is just all this disgust..
consumer: I was thinking of coming back to your side
consumer: At first, when the complex post-traumatic stress disorder broke out, I was in a really bad state and disconnected
consumer: That's why I think I don't deserve anything So for the treatment.. because I don't suffer enough, at least not like then.. I was in a life-and-death situation every day with sleep apnea.. I couldn't breathe, with really bad shortness of breath and disconnections to the extent that I feel half in heaven and half in the ground
consumer: There are girls there who got there on time.. 
I feel somehow that I missed the treatment train.. 
When I was in really, really difficult situations, I thought it was spiritual... despite all the suffering, so I didn't go for treatment
agent: Dissociation is a symptom of complex trauma and you most deserve to receive treatment, because no one deserves to carry the pain and what comes with the trauma in their day-to-day functioning
consumer: I have no function
agent: It sounds like you want to return to function and you deserve it
consumer: only in berry situations Ha.. such a kind of manic attack.. I work as a volume operator
consumer: Yesterday, for example, after a good few months of not tidying the room, I cleaned it to escape from these thoughts that scare me
consumer: I thought I had to distract them
consumer: And in general, I'm having really hard days
consumer: I'm in the room all day, sleeping.. that's it..
agent: Actually you are saying that either you are in obsessive thoughts about what you have been through in life and with that comes the pain or you are in actions that distract you. It also sounds natural in the situation you are in
consumer: I had to, I just felt at war yesterday
I had to run away from these thoughts that I don't want
agent: You can be understood, it can feel like madness sometimes and it's good that you have things that distract you. Whether it's cleaning or sleeping it doesn't matter it's what your body and mind choose for you
consumer: In two weeks I have an appointment with a psychiatrist.. I don't know what to tell her.. if I should go back to the ward
agent: It sounds like it would be best to decide together with her
consumer: I just didn't clean for a long time and that was the only thing that could have distracted me
consumer: She always tells me to go back to the department... that I need a framework in my situation
consumer: Because my depression is really bad
consumer: She is already a little discouraged by the situation
agent: It can be an unpleasant feeling to think that someone who is supposed to care about you is desperate for you.
consumer: A month ago she sent me to the ER because of the suicidal thoughts.. Coping is hard
consumer: because She tries to convince me that I need a frame.. and my mind is just too tired for people, etc. 
Just tired of everything that has happened to me and is happening to me
agent: From what you describe, it sounds like she does see your situation and cares for you
consumer: I was supposed to be hospitalized, and I chose not to because I don't have the strength for the framework and the people..
Consumer: Yes
agent: You said that it's hard for you to trust people and it's understandable that it's hard for you to think about being in their company, on the other hand when you're alone the emotions and pain float
consumer: I prefer to suffer alone
consumer: But sometimes it's dangerous
agent: It's good that you find the strength to contact us and not be alone in moments of risk
consumer: I really, really need silence.. and I don't even know why.. 
As quiet and alone as possible..
consumer: 
consumer: Bm It happened that I contacted you yesterday
consumer: But it wasn't during business hours
consumer: And then you came back to me
consumer: And you caught me right in the lurch
agent: I understand, you can always also call the telephone helpline which is also active at night
consumer: I didn't know
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: 1202 works 24/7 all year round

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello, my name is Naomi. I send on WhatsApp because it's easier for me to write.
I was injured by a gynecologist about a month and a half ago.
I receive psychological help (psychological treatment also regardless of this specific case)
I would be happy to consult what can be done
Consumer: Yes
consumer: .
consumer: Thank you. Waiting patiently.
agent: Hello, sorry for the wait, I'm here now
consumer: Thank you
consumer: I'm not sure where and how to start
agent: Maybe you will share about yourself in general
agent: And if you are facing any difficulty and what could help
consumer: I have endometriosis and was sexually abused as a child.
On 02/07 I went to see a gynecologist due to increased pain and a consultation about continuous bleeding A pills.
consumer: This is my second time with this doctor
agent: And the visit to the doctor went well?
consumer: And for the first time during the test with the ultrasound probe, she touched my clitoris gently before inserting it into the vagina.
And the second time I reached her it was very clear that this was not a mistake because the touch was not gentle but repeated with a little more pressure
agent: I imagine it was very stressful
consumer: very much 
agent: Things like that can be so triggering. I have no idea about the reason - if she is just an unaware doctor or did it on purpose, in any case, it sounds really triggering when you are in such an intrusive examination and with the history of sexual abuse
agent: I'm really, really sorry to hear that it's K Good luck with the tests
consumer: Is there anything to do with the doctor? Can I complain?
Explain to her that we don't do it?
I don't know what the options are.. but it shouldn't happen and I'd love for it not to happen to anyone else...
consumer: On the mental side, I am being treated by a psychologist due to the post-trauma and the difficulties of endometriosis..
consumer: I would love to know if there is a way to explain, teach, or file a complaint if it happens again and there are accidentally other girls who complained about her..
agent: You are absolutely right. We really don't know what the reason for her behavior is, but I would try to think of a professional at the health fund who could talk to her. Maybe a women's health social worker?
agent: Every organization also has a sexual harassment prevention officer. If there were any other complaints and such, they must have reached her.
consumer: And how do you know it wasn't a mistake? And that advocacy will be enough?
agent: or to the social worker
consumer: My fear is being plastered 
agent: It's really hard to know. Maybe it's worth starting by informing the social worker of what happened, and that you don't know if it was insensitivity or, God forbid, intentional harm, but it's important for you to explain to the doctor that it's really serious to do such a thing.
consumer: ok. Thanks.
agent: If you want to make sure that they are not whitewashed, then you can ask to report to the sexual harassment prevention officer of the branch or the health fund. She must perform an investigation procedure and talk to the doctor about it.
agent: Hope you got some direction, sorry you had to experience what you experienced and hope that in the future you will be able to use a doctor who is more sensitive and sensitive to trauma.
consumer: Thank you very much

I'm just currently abroad and will return to Israel in just two months and I want to start as early as possible before the recruitment.
(I enlist in December)
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, first of all I want to strengthen you for wanting to go through such a process, it's a really significant and not obvious step. Is it important to you that upon your return to Israel you will have the opportunity to meet with the therapist face to face as well? If so, it is important for me to know what your area of ​​residence is in order to create the most suitable connection
consumer: I think so
consumer: I live in the Rosh Pina area but am willing to make the trip for a suitable therapist
agent: WhatsApp's assistance is nationwide That's why I don't have details about therapists in this area. Is it okay to ask for your phone number and name and I will ask that they get back to you on WhatsApp with details of a suitable therapist?
consumer: Yes, I would be very happy, thank you
agent: perfectly fine, please write me a phone number and maybe also the area to which you would feel comfortable traveling to receive treatment.
consumer: Oh right, I forgot
agent: Would you like to share a bit of what you're going through?

Up to Haifa but closer is better

agent: Thanks Daniel, I'll make sure they get back to you
agent: for now I'm here for what you want to share

consumer: a I will summarize
consumer: I was sexually assaulted when I was 6 something like that by my older sister 7 years older than me.
Today I am 19 years old
consumer: It was more consensual sexual relations but I had no idea what was right and what was wrong and what exactly I meant by what I was doing
consumer: And I was in treatment for two years which ended a year ago due to Ocd and that's when I was able to open the issue for the first time after it happened
consumer: But we weren't able to investigate in depth because at the exact same time I ended up with her because I finished 12th and was in public play
consumer: And I didn't really want to file a complaint or anything about it. Yes, she hurt me a lot. I notice it especially since I'm 19, so people have friends, start dating girls, do sexual things with girls, and I Not because I'm just scared
consumer: And it's also okay that I'm scared, I just want to learn how to manage a healthy relationship and sexuality and that I'll feel safe in it
consumer: simply the touch of girls that becomes sexual and not my friends really discourages me

consumer: I'm enlisting in another 4 months for combat and I decided that this is the best time to take care of it before I enlist and I don't know where to start
consumer: I managed to tell this thing Also for my twin sister a few months ago it was really significant and I wanted to tell her about it for a long time but it didn't feel like the right time

consumer: And that's basically the story

agent: You definitely deserve a romantic relationship, it's such a natural and basic thing to want it. On the other hand, it is also very logical that it is complicated and complex for you, and it is good that you are open to continuing to deal with it in therapy.

agent: It makes so much sense that after you have experienced sexuality without being able to express your voice and your will, you will be afraid that the following relationships will be like this as well. It's painful and unfair that this is the feeling you come away with.

And I was just shocked. She presents herself as a victim of a situation that she simply controlled. Come on, especially that it happened as what times

agent: It's very difficult, that in addition to what you went through as a child, there are now family sediments in front of your sister that you have to deal with, instead of having an experience of taking responsibility on her part.
consumer: true
agent: The very fact that your mother is confronting her now is progress, not simply that she knew about it at the time and didn't find a way to protect you. It's hard to deal with all the emotions it brings up.
consumer: I don't want to take revenge, and I don't want anything, I just want the care I deserve and it's just annoying. She says she was also a victim.

She has a relationship, she did experience sexual things with other people 
I don't and not because I didn't have this opportunity because I was really hurt physically, hurt and mentally

Daniel put their anger aside, they want to be angry, let them be angry, you will concentrate on yourself and your treatment and start it

consumer: Thank you very much, I appreciate it very much

consumer: Hi
consumer: I would be happy to consult
consumer: A friend shared with me that she suffers repeated harassment from foreign men who start with her (and sometimes touch her). Wondering what is the way for her to respond and repel them while maintaining her confidence?
agent: Hi, I saw that you contacted last night, sounds like a difficult experience, if you want I'm here and we can talk.
consumer: Hi, yes, I would appreciate some advice
agent: First of all, it's really not easy to hear that a company is going through something like this.  It can evoke an experience of helplessness.
consumer: We had all kinds of ideas to deal with it that we came up with together, but I told her that I prefer to be more confident and consult with someone who understands
agent: It is natural to feel a desire for an external party to give direction on how to live Measure against these scary situations
agent: In what situations does she encounter harassment?
consumer: She says it happens to her every day, several times a day. On the street, in the supermarket, when she is alone, when she is with friends/family. All the time
agent: Wow, it sounds awful to experience again and again and feel that the space is so broken and that there is no protection.
agent: What ideas did you come up with?
consumer: Sometimes she says she has a boyfriend or something like that and they leave her. Most of the times they bully her a lot, don't move away when she asks and even touch her
consumer: We thought that if there were other women around then to stand up for them and ask for help, or threaten the police or pepper spray
agent: Wow, this is so intrusive, such an unpleasant and invasive experience.
agent: everything Your ideas sound great, what are you unsure about?
consumer: I was worried that they would hurt her more if she didn't find a precise way to respond
consumer: that if she shows more power then they will be even more powerful towards her
agent: It can be really scary to confront such abusive people
agent: It might be possible to use your ideas gradually, that is, start with the least threatening things, say she has a boyfriend, then go to other women and ask for help, and if that doesn't help, then threaten to call the police or pepper spray
consumer: Yes, that's the direction
agent: And with all that, it sounds like you're not calm
consumer: Yes, what to do, this situation sucks
agent: It's a really difficult situation, that you can't walk around in the public space for me to be afraid that someone will intrude on it in an unwanted way. And even a defensive reaction can be a danger in itself.
agent: I'm still here if you want to continue talking and thinking, you are also welcome to suggest a company that will contact us directly.
agent: It is important for me to say that the thing we (the women) can do is to be in this together. And it must be very significant for your friend that you are with, but on the other hand it is not easy for you to meet this difficulty through her.
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: It's good that you contacted us, you are always welcome to come back and contact us.
transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
I would be happy to consult
A friend shared with me that she suffers repeated harassment from foreign men who start with her (and sometimes touch her). Wondering what is the way for her to respond and repel them while maintaining her confidence?
Hi, yes I would appreciate the advice
We had all kinds of ideas for coping that we came up with together, but I told her that I prefer to be more confident and consult with someone who understands
She says it happens to her every day, several times a day. On the street, in the supermarket, when she is alone, when she is with friends/family. All the time
Sometimes she says she has a boyfriend or something like that and they leave her. Most of the times they bully her a lot, don't move away when she asks and even touch her
We thought that if there were other women around then to go stand with them and ask for help, or to the island Police or pepper spray
I was worried that they would hurt her more if she didn't find a precise way to respond
that if she shows more power then they will be even more powerful towards her
Yes, that is the direction
Yes, what to do, this situation sucks
Thank you very much

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: hi what's going on? I would appreciate your help, a friend told me yesterday that on Friday she was harassed (she went to sleep in a tent with her friend and woke up when he touched her) 
Can you please guide me what to do? How to help her?
consumer: ok thanks
consumer: Is there anyone here for real?
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi
agent: Hi, my name is Maya, I volunteer at an aid center
consumer: A friend told me yesterday that she was sexually harassed on Friday, she went to sleep with a friend in a tent and woke up when he touched her
consumer: And I just want to know what to do
consumer: how to help her? Suggest that she go to a psychologist? talk to you?
agent: It sounds like she went through a difficult experience, and it's hard for you to hear about it too
consumer: She is a distant friend , we studied together two years ago and today we are not that much in touch but it sounds like she has no one else to turn to
consumer: I just don't really know what to do, it feels big to me and I'm afraid I'll do more harm than good
consumer: So I would simply like instructions on what to do, how to talk to her, who to refer to and if at all
agent: It sounds like she trusts you and she can share with you such a difficult event she went through. You are a listening ear for her
agent: You can tell about the fear you feel
consumer: I'm not afraid, I'll just be happy for guidance hahahaha
consumer: how to behave and what to do
agent: It's not easy to hear about harassment or sexual abuse. It can cause a lot of grief and pain. It sounds like the girl who was hurt feels comfortable talking to you and sharing what she feels If it suits you, just listening and understanding her pain is giving and doing a lot
consumer: Is there a possibility to get a more precise direction?
consumer: Let's say when you go to the doctor, he has a treatment plan (medications/tests that should be done)
What should be done in such a case?
agent: There are no right things to do in every situation. It is a topic of conversation with the company if she raises these questions. what should i do
consumer: I'm meeting with her tomorrow and want to arrive more prepared
consumer: As mentioned, we are not very close, I don't know what can help her because I don't know her that well
consumer: Are there psychologists who specialize in this? Is there a psychological service adapted to victims of sexual abuse? You should encourage a police complaint
consum er: Is there a page on your website where I can look at things to do? Any input will help
consumer: really need the most technical 
of dos and don'ts because she is really in a sensitive situation
consumer: what to expect?
agent: It sounds like you want to give her answers that will help her. Maybe it is right to just listen and see what is appropriate for her to do, if she would like to talk to a professional therapist or doctor, maybe complain, and maybe just share the pain of the difficult experience of betraying her trust
consumer: And if she wants any of the professional options, who should she contact?
consumer: I guess not every doctor deals with it, nor every psychologist
consumer: If she contacts you, can you give her more details?
agent: If this is what will come up, we usually apply To a professional who is trusted by a family doctor or a nurse or a social worker and he can refer to a more professional therapist in the field of sexual abuse. You can also give her the contact information for an assistance center on WhatsApp or on line 1202 and she will talk to us if she wants to
consumer: Ok, thank you very much
agent: You are welcome to contact again when you feel the need to do so

consumer: Hi
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: I don't really know where to start, nothing happened to me personally just now, but someone who is very close to me was severely raped
consumer: I was the first person she turned to, I heard a lot of graphic descriptions and since then I dream about it at night all the time and can't function properly because of the fear and worry for her
consumer: and as someone who has gone through such and other harassment herself in the past, it made me very sick to hear about all these things from someone who is so close to me
agent: It sounds like you are very close to your friend and she was able to share what was happening with her
consumer: She is not a friend, she was an apprentice of mine in a youth movement that I mentored
consumer: So I'm Sue c of an authority figure for her
consumer: She is currently in another country
consumer: And her parents aren't really there to help her
consumer: I feel that a lot of responsibility falls on me and at the same time I am not able to hear these difficult things
consumer: I was on a video call with her five minutes after the incident happened and I saw her clothes stained with blood and I don't know what to do with all this information right now
consumer: I feel like it's heavy on me
agent: Your character was probably very meaningful to her that she could reach out and share with you. It is very difficult to listen to a story of sexual abuse and it triggers many feelings of empathy along with great fear
consumer: Yes, I'm glad she felt comfortable with me and I really care about her 
On the other hand I also take care of myself and I don't understand why of all people it should have fallen on me because I'm in a different country than her and I have no way to help her too much
consumer: I talk to her and her mother 24/7 since the incident that happened a week and a half ago
consumer: about an hour after the incident happened I was on the phone with her and her mother and I had to tell her mother what happened because she had really bad physical injuries and she had to go to the hospital
consumer: and since then her bleeding has returned and I feel that her parents are unable to manipulate the situation, they do not take her for a check-up and the responsibility falls on me
agent: It sounds like it's really a very big case and very emotionally disturbing. You are there to listen only as much and as much as you can to contain
agent: It sounds like you are aware of your feelings and listen to yourself as much as you can be involved, with all the desire to help the girl
agent: Maybe you should suggest that she try to find out if where she is she can go to an assistance center or for tests at a medical center and they will refer her to that country
consumer: I kind of see myself in this girl, if that makes sense, I think that's why the situation is hard for me to comprehend
consumer: I try to refer them for help but her parents can't handle the situation and don't give her a safe place to talk to them
consumer: They blame her a little for everything that happened, that everything that happened happened because she didn't come early and tell them that she was meeting with this guy
consumer: a few days ago Water, she called me crying after she woke up from a nightmare
agent: hearing a story about sexual abuse of a girl you know can very easily bring up memories of sexual abuse or sexual harassment you've experienced in the past. It happens to each of us and it is very natural to strongly feel its pain.
agent: It's always a very traumatic and painful story and it's not easy to gather strength and listen. Therefore it is very right to be for her only as much as you can
agent: It's a shame that there isn't enough support and understanding from the parents. They are really the first place that can help her. In any case, the responsibility is not yours
consumer: So how should I set the limit?
consumer: between something that makes sense for me to include and something that doesn't?

c onsumer: I don't know
consumer: I really don't know what to do with this situation anymore
agent: It sounds like you are debating whether to stay in touch with her? To be addressed to a certain extent, or to cut off the connection completely - too painful and destabilizing
consumer: I can't cut contact with her completely, I'm worried about her all day

agent: This is really taking on too much responsibility. You are not responsible for her anymore. Can occasionally be there for her and listen to her and that's a lot.
agent: It sounds like she needs escort and professional treatment as soon as possible
con sumer: I spoke to her mother on the phone yesterday and told her she needed to see a psychologist urgently, she told me she would take care of it
agent: It seems that your heart is with her and your giving is huge and very meaningful. It sounds like you're mad at yourself for not being able to save her. consumer: שלום, שמי שי.
בת הזוג שלי, לימור, בת 42, היתה קורבן להתעללות מינית מגיל 19 עד 26. התחתנה, הביאה 2 ילדים והתגרשה לפני 6 שנים. מאז בקשרים עם הרבה גברים, עם רובם מבחינתה אפלטוני אבל עם רמיזות מיניות לעתים בוטות מצידה ועם מקצתם סטוצים וקשרים של ניצול (אחד שהיה בא לאכול, לישון, לשכב, ובבוקר ללכת). היכרנו לפני 6 חודשים וכל הזמן סיפרה לי על ידידים שבאים אליה לשתות קפה. אמרה לי שזה סתם. הפריע לי אבל שתקתי כי אני אוהב אותה ולא רוצה להיפרד. לאחרונה התנהגה מוזר, הרגשתי שהיא מסתירה. חיטטתי בוואטספים שלה וגיליתי שהיא מחליפה הודעות זימה עם גבר נשוי. היא סיפרה לי עליו בעבר שהם היו בקשר לפני 3 שנים אבל לא היה שם כלום. בהודעות ראיתי שהוא ביקש להיפגש למטרת מין והיא הזמינה אותו אליה. התעמתי איתה והיא אמרה שהיא ביטלה את המפגש. הודתה גם שהיא מכורה לגברים לדבריה.
לדעתי התנהלותה מול גברים נגזרת מההתעללות שהיא חוותה משך זמן ארוך.

consumer: Hello, my name is Shay.
My partner, Limor, 42 years old, was a victim of sexual abuse from the age of 19 to 26. She got married, had 2 children and divorced 6 years ago. Since then she has been in relationships with many men, with most of them platonic for her but with sometimes blatant sexual innuendos on her part and with some of them stalkers and relationships of exploitation (one who would come to eat, sleep, lie down, and in the morning leave). We met 6 months ago and she kept telling me about friends coming to her for coffee. She told me it was just. It bothered me but I kept quiet because I love her and don't want to say goodbye. Recently she was behaving strangely, I felt she was hiding. I snooped on her WhatsApp and found that she was exchanging lewd messages with a married man. She told me about him before that they were in contact 3 years ago But there was nothing there. In the messages I saw that he asked to meet for sex and she invited him to her. I confronted her and she said she canceled the meeting. She also admitted that she is addicted to men according to her.
In my opinion, her behavior towards men is derived from the abuse she experienced for a long time.
We are looking for a forum/workshop/factor that can help her. Can you help us?
Consumer: Yes
