כן אני פשוט מפחדת עכשיו לחיות  אני מניחה,  לא יכולה לעבור דרך רחובות ספציפיים יותר 
אני שיתפתי את חברה שלי בזה והיא זאת שבאמת ממש עזרה לי והתעקשה שאני אשיג עזרה וטיפול ונתנה לי וולידציה שההורים שלי לא יכלו לתת לי,  כאילו באמת שאם לא הייתי מבחינה בכמה היא רוצה שאני אהיה בסדר אני כנראה הייתי נופלת להרגלים רעים שוב
תמיד הייתה לי היסטוריה עם מחלות נפש וקשיים חברתיים והרצון להיות אהובה ומובנת, והייתי מחפשת להיות מישהי רצויה דרך פגיעה עצמית עם סכינים וחומרים סינטטים ולהקיף את עצמי בחברה שמורידה מאיכות החיים 
ואני רק בתחילת ספטמבר החלטתי שאני מפסקה ורוצה לחיות כי אומנם אני כבר בת 20 ולא ילדה יותר אבל רציתי לתת לעצמי סיכוי
אבל אני מניחה שהתפקששתי במשהו 
אני דווקא כן הייתי שמחה אם הייתה לי את אפשרות לדבר עם מישהו שיש לו את היכולת  לטפל ולעזור לי ,יותר מרק חברי
קודם כל אני ממש ממש מודה על ההקשבה עאמ לא יודעת אני מניחה שבעיניי זה לא מובן מאליו ואני אשמח לשמוע אפשרויות לטיפול
ההמ אוקיי זה 50₪ למפגש שבו אני יכולה לקבוע כמה פעמים בשבוע?
וזה בסדר אני חושבת שזה כמות חיונית  של מידע
ויהיה דרך לעזור לי בלהירשם למפגשים האלה או שאני עושה זאת עצמאית ?
אוקיי בעקרון אני חושבת שהאופציה שהראשונה והשלישית הפ היחידות שאני אוכל לממן  כרגע  ואני ממש ממש מודה לך על הכל
אוקיי יש לכם את הסכמתי  ואני במרכז הארץ
תל אביב
תודה רבה לך ^_^ אני אעשה זאת המשך ערב נעים
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Good morning ^_^ I'm Winky Tong and I spoke with a social work student about a case of sexual assault that happened to me about four months ago and she freed me to write to you about assistance after being unsuccessful with a lawyer for sexual victims due to a lack of evidence, I would be happy to talk to you in depth about Whatever happened if that's an option, thanks.
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I see you contacted us earlier today. I'm here now if it's convenient for you to talk
consumer: Hey hmm, should I send what I wrote before again or are we getting into business?
agent: I read what you sent. I understand that you were assaulted and want to file a complaint
consumer: the assistance you can give me is only criminal? Since I tried it before and the conclusion that My arrival is that it will not lead to a good solution for me,
agent: Our assistance is to listen to your difficulty. hold him together with you. There is a possibility of meetings at an assistance center. It is possible to get legal advice.
agent: We have a phone line and a WhatsApp line. Whatever is convenient for you, we are here for you
agent: regardless of whether you file a complaint or not
consumer: Okay, I thank you, I would love to hear about meetings at an assistance center
consumer: And I think I would feel more comfortable through text messages than a phone call
agent: It's just important for me to explain that you can correspond on WhatsApp here whenever you want
agent: The meetings at the center are additional if it is important for you to meet physically
consumer: Okay, of course, thank you very much, um, I'm sorry, would you like me to explain a A What happened?
agent: I want to be here for what you need. Listening to what you want to share with me
agent: If it suits you to tell what happened, you are welcome
consumer: Oh, okay, thanks
agent: I'm here
consumer: Um, so I guess I'll start with what happened
Agent: Yes
consumer: Just to make some sense of what happened hahahaha, so it's like I'm an art student and I finance myself financially, which has always been a problem for me and a particular frustration that I had to think about financing the next few years, and at the same time I needed a job and I signed up for a job-finding website and they called me And they told me that it was work in art in clubs and decorations and that I could go to a studio in Tel Aviv and bring all the old works and materials to start working and that I would be paid for this work and I would be informed later if it worked, so it turns out that it was not a job interview and the entire phone conversation I had with him was fake, and somehow he found himself giving me an answer to all the things that were supposed to be in the interview and were not , for example another person with him lol
Agent: Yes
consumer: Then he seemed to skim through my work and I could feel that something was very suspicious, but I guess out of desperation for work I didn't leave, then he started explaining about the work and from there he asked me to sit down and do an exercise that all the employees do together, then he did what he did For three hours and I really wanted someone to save me and then because I A lives in Tel Aviv, I needed him to take me back home and he tried to get me to get in his car claiming that he just wanted to meditate and I started crying that he would just get me out of the car and he made me crazy and put on music and be like that I just wanted us to listen to music
Agent: Yes
consumer: And like that I couldn't go to the bathroom without crying because of how much I was in pain after that or looking in the mirror or getting dressed
And like that I couldn't work anymore either, I couldn't work with the thought of even going to a job interview especially if it was a male interviewer, and I was just so powerless and out of control, and I find myself choosing to give up whether it's conscious or not
agent: You were desperate for work and he just took advantage of the situation and hurt you
consumer: etc It's like let's say now I can barely hold down jobs but I can't afford not to work because I have to live somehow and I'm in constant anxiety of what will happen if I do get fired at a certain point just an endless circle where I return to the same point and it's as if the image I'm stuck in is haunted but A hardship that really happened to my physical body and soul
consumer: Yes, I was terribly disgusted to say the least, I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk about it seriously
agent: the physical harm was in the past but the mental harm continues and you feel the results in the present and it affects your anxiety and security
agent: Speak as you see fit, I understand
agent: Do you have someone you share what you are going through
cons umer: Yes I'm just afraid to live now I guess, can't pass through more specific streets 
agent: You've been hurt and you're afraid of being hurt again, that's very understandable
consumer: I shared this with my friend and she was the one who really really helped me and insisted that I get help and treatment and gave me validation that my parents couldn't give me, as if really if I hadn't noticed how much she wanted me to be okay I probably would have fallen into bad habits again
agent: It's wonderful that you have such a good friend who cares for you
agent: You wrote bad habits again what is meant
consumer: I have always had a history with mental illness and social difficulties and the desire to be loved and understood, and I was looking to be someone desirable through self-harm with Knives and synthetic materials and surround myself with a society that lowers the quality of life 
And it was only at the beginning of September that I decided that I was quitting and wanted to live, because although I am already 20 years old and no longer a child, I wanted to give myself a chance
consumer: But I guess I missed something 
agent: You speak very openly and it sounds like you are very aware of yourself and I wanted to ask if you would like to take care of yourself with professional help
consumer: I would actually be happy if I had the opportunity to talk to someone who has the ability to treat and help me, more than my friend
agent: You are welcome to contact us to talk whenever you want, of course, but we do not provide care. Would you like me to write you the treatment options that are available
consumer: First of all I really, really thank you for Listening, I don't know, I guess to me it is not obvious and I would love to hear options for treatment
agent: Option 1 The state allows treatment at no cost in designated centers for the treatment of women and men victims of sexual assault. The treatment is funded by the Ministry of Welfare and requires approval from the welfare department in the locality where the woman lives. The waiting list is usually long, but you should sign up and see what happens. Option 2 The health funds are obligated by law to allow receiving mental health care. The treatment is subsidized by the fund and limited to about 30 sessions. The payment for treatment is around NIS 150 (varies according to the regulations of each POS). Not all of the care workers on the list of KofH specialize in the treatment of sexual injury/trauma. Option 3 Treatment by a specialist in one of the centers Assistance with a symbolic payment of NIS 50 but currently there is no room until 10/23 option 4 private treatment
agent: I bombarded you with information, I hope it is understandable, you are welcome to ask
consumer: hmm ok is it NIS 50 per session where I can schedule how many times a week?
consumer: And that's fine, I think it's an essential amount of information
consumer: And will there be a way to help me register for these meetings or do I do it independently?
agent: The meeting with an intern depends on an available spot and currently everything is busy until October. If this option interests you, I can transfer your details to an operator who knows the subject of the treatment in depth and she will be able to give more details
consumer: Okay, in principle, I think that the first and third option are the only ones I can finance And I really, really thank you for everything
agent: If you want them to get back to you, I will need your consent and also to know from which region of the country
consumer: Okay, you have my consent and I am in the center of the country
agent: Raanana area or Tel Aviv? I need to know which branch I am referring to
consumer: Tel Aviv
agent: I will contact and ask, but in any case I suggest if you manage to call the number 1202 and ask to register for meetings with an intern. When you dial the number, the answer is to the center that is closest to the geographical area.
consumer: Thank you very much ^_^ I'll do it. Have a nice evening
agent: Thank you for sharing with me and you are welcome to contact us whenever you want. Goodbye and good luck

consumer: Yes, but it feels like I really have no way out
agent: because of the lack of money?

consumer: Yes, but unfortunately it's also only for the long term, I need it really urgently
consumer: And loans and such is not something that is given to So I'm really stuck

consumer: Yes, I work, but my salary is not enough
agent: Glad to read that you are working. It is not easy for most people to manage their salary.
consumer: Yes, so I don't know what to do now
agent: How about applying for training that will help you manage your salary?
consumer: where?
agent: Have you heard about the field of coaching?
agent: training.
Consumer: No
agent: This is a field that is not therapeutic but aimed practically at dealing with all kinds of difficulties, including financial ones
consumer: Is the help immediate or does it take a long time?
agent: It's a learning process
consumer: ? how long does it take?
Agent: On the way Total around 10 sessions
consumer: Do these 10 meetings take a long time or is it quite fast?
agent: meeting is 45 minutes

consumer: Okay Anastasia

agent: I will try to take care of it in the coming days. I really hope you can get a practical direction that will help you
consumer: Thank you very much

consumer: generally
agent: perfectly fine

consumer: קוראים לי עדי ואני אמא לנערה בת 16. היא שיתפה אותי השבוע שבסילבסטר היתה במסיבה ושם בחור מהשכבה שלה שהיה חבר טוב שלה יצא איתה החוצה וניסה בכוח לנשק אותה ונגע לה באיברים אינטימיים היא הצליחה להדוף אותו. הוא היה קצת שתוי והיא לא. היא די עברה הלאה, ניתקה קשר עם הבחור. הוא התנצל אבל היא סירבה לחזור לקשר ידידות איתו. בשבוע שעבר היתה במחנה של התנועת נוער בחול ואיך שהוא זה עלה לה שם והיא שיתפה שם חברה טובה ופתאום הרגישה שכל הדבר הזה צף לה ושאולי זה השפיע עליה יותר משהיא חשבה. היא התחילה לחלום על זה בלילה, היא התקשרה ושיתפה את אחותה הגדולה שאמרה לה שהיא חייבת לספר לי ושהיא חושבת שאולי היא צריכה לדבר עם מישהו כדי לעבד את האירוע יותר טוב.. 
אז היא שיתפה אותי.. 
אני לא כל כך יודעת מה לעשות עם זה ולכן אני פונה..
agent: קודם כל זה משמח שהיא הסכימה לשתף אותך, זה לא מובן  מאליו ומראה שהיא סומכת עלייך
agent: אנחנו במרכז סיוע ממליצות על טיפול כמה שיותר מהר, אם ביתך מסכימה לזה, כמובן. נוכל גם להלמליץ על מטפלים מתמחים בפגיעה מינית (בהתאם לאיזור מגורים שלכן, מרכז סיוע המקומי יוכל לתת לך מידע)

טוב שיש לה משפחה תומכת וחשוב שתוכל לדבר איתכן על מה שקרה לה ועל תחושותיה

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hello, good evening
I am here with you
consumer: hi hello
consumer: I'm not sure I've reached the right place but I'll try and you tell me.
agent: perfectly fine
consumer: My name is Adi and I am the mother of a 16-year-old girl. She shared with me this week that on New Year's Eve she was at a party and there a guy from her class who was a good friend of hers went out with her and tried to forcefully kiss her and touch her private parts, she managed to repel him. He was a little drunk and she wasn't. She kind of moved on, cut contact with the guy. He apologized but she refused to go back to being friends with him. Last week she was at the camp of the youth movement in the sand and somehow it cost her there and she shared a good friend there and suddenly felt that this whole thing was floating her and that maybe it affected her more than she thought. She started dreaming about it at night, she called and shared her older sister who told her that she had to tell me and that she thought maybe she should talk to someone to process the event better.. 
So she shared with me.. 
I don't really know what to do with it, so I'm turning away..
agent: First of all, it's gratifying that she agreed to share with you, it's not obvious and shows that she trusts you
agent: We at the aid center recommend treatment as soon as possible, if your family agrees to it, of course. We can also recommend therapists specializing in sexual abuse (depending on your area of ​​residence, the local assistance center will be able to give you information)
consumer: I would appreciate the information. We live in Modi'in
age nt: It is quite natural that it took time for her mind to try to suppress what happened and the effect on her, but after some time the effect is felt and sometimes very felt.
It is good that she has a supportive family and it is important that she can talk to you about what happened to her and her feelings
agent: The direct phone number of the assistance center in Jerusalem is 02-6255558.
Their email is: siua@jrcc1202.org
There they will be able to refer you and provide the most relevant information
consumer: Thank you, I'm upset that this is her first sexual experience.. not that much happened there, but what happened was not pleasant and was not wanted
consumer: Thank you
agent: Of course, when you're a mother and something happens to your daughter and it's not at all under your control, it's very upsetting
agent: It is also important to note that your home probably also feels its name What happened took her control of her life, so it's really important to help her get control back. Give her the choice about treatment or any help, or anything else. 
You are also qualified to suggest that she talk to us herself. You can by phone or here on WhatsApp or chat - whatever is most convenient. Sometimes just talking about her feelings can help a little and make it easier
consumer: great, that's also a good idea
agent: and how are you? How do *you* feel about this painful news?
consumer: mostly disgusted, especially because my older daughter also told me mom, all my friends have experienced this.. I have 4 daughters.. so it's stressful
agent: so stressful! The world is cruel and we can't prevent it...
agent: The main thing is that your girls feel that they can tell you about anything what happens to them, that you can help
consumer: Yes, thank you very much

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Is there someone to talk to?
agent: Good evening, my name is Ruth. I am here with you
consumer: I have really strong flashbacks and I can't understand what's going on
agent: Good that you chose to share. It's not easy to experience flashbacks
consumer: I feel everything happening, I'm here one moment and there the next and I don't understand what's real and what's not, everything gets mixed up in me I don't know what to do I'm scared
agent: Fear is very natural when there are flashbacks
agent: Maybe you want to tell where you are now. I listen to you
consumer: I don't know
agent: are you at home right now?
consumer: I think so
consumer: I don't know
consumer: I'm afraid
agent: I'm with you. Try to describe something you see in front of you
consumer: I see him mo me and feel him touching me and I hear screams and feel the pavement below me and I also see a couch and a table and a TV and hear the air conditioner working and all together I don't understand what's going on
agent: You are currently writing to me. And it's real. And I listen to you. And it's real too. Feel your fingers typing. Try to notice if you feel your feet as well
consumer: I can't focus on anything
consumer: I can hardly breathe I feel like I'm going to die it's so painful
agent: It's very natural to feel that way during flashbacks. The pain is great. but you are here Talking to me on WhatsApp. You are now in a safe place
consumer: I just want it to end already
consumer: I don't know what to do, I just want that The will stop
agent: Let's try to take three deep breaths together. We will take a breath, hold it inside and count 3, and then let go quickly and all at once. Tag me if you succeeded and I'll tag you too
consumer: I'm really trying
consumer: It's harsh
agent: It's great that you're trying. Even if it's hard. I did that too. with you
consumer: I can't do it
agent: I want to offer you another exercise that can help. do you agree
Consumer: Yes
agent: Stand where you are, and raise both hands high up high. Then take them off at once with a strong exhale. Do it once or twice in a row. Tell me if you succeeded
consumer: I can't get up
consumer: I can barely move
agent: It means you are sitting or lying down consumer: Lying down
agent: You can do this exercise of raising your hands and lowering them quickly with a strong exhalation even while lying down
consumer: why is it so hard?
agent: It's really hard. And it sounds like you are alone with this
consumer: I'm alone, I don't have anyone
consumer: Even my psychologist screens me
consumer: I just want it to stop
agent: Is there anyone you can tell. to share
consumer: I don't have anyone
agent: The desire for it to stop is a good will. We can think together about what can be done to make it easier
consumer: I have no friends and the family is dysfunctional, the house is violent and the psychologist screens me at the most critical moments
agent: It's good to have a psychologist, even if she's not available all the time. In critical moments you You can immediately contact us here
consumer: Will it ever end?
agent: The processes you do will help you make a change
consumer: I have been in treatment for almost 10 years, nothing changes and I just keep getting hurt more and more
agent: how are you now? It sounds like you are less confused than at the beginning of the conversation
consumer: better
agent: The road is not easy and it is natural that it is long and continuous. You need a lot of patience and support. I want to wish you to find someone you can share it with. You don't have to share everything. Even one thing you can share
consumer: I hope so
agent: Remember the exercise we did together. Even though we only correspond, the fact that we did it together was very meaningful to me as well.  You can do the This exercise every time you feel that the difficulty is increasing.
consumer: Thank you for being with me and helping me
agent: Thank you too

agent: יצירת קשר עם מרכז הסיוע לנפגעות ונפגעי תקיפה מינית תאיר - שפלה הדפסה  דואר אלקטרוני
קו סיוע: 08-9496020 - הקו פעיל 24 שעות, 7 ימים בשבוע. 
דואל: donation@tair1202.org
פקס: 08-9496025
כתובת: ת.ד. 1273 רחובות 7611201
agent: אפשר גם לפנות לרווחה ברמלה לנפגעים. והם יכולים לסייע לקבוע לחבר שלך פגישה.
agent: המרכז לשלום המשפחה
מרכז אזורי המשרת את תושבי רמלה ומטרתו לתת סיוע, יעוץ וטיפול למשפחות בהן מתקיימת דינמיקה זוגית אלימה. המרכז נותן כלים לביסוס דפוסי תקשורת אסרטיביים, שליטה בכעסים, ומלווה בתהליך היציאה ממעגל האלימות. טיפול פרטני, טיפול קבוצתי נשים גברים ילדים.
מטרות המרכז
הפסקת האלימות בתוך המשפחה (כשהמוקד הוא - אלימות בין בני זוג).
הסברה ומניעה באמצעות הגברת המודעות בקרב אנשי מקצוע ובציבור - לתופעת האלימות במשפחה.
קיום סדנאות לאוכלוסייה בעיר.
השירותים המוצעים במרכז:
טיפול ישיר - עם דגש על הערכת מסוכנות - בתחילת התהליך, ובהמשך מתן כלים להתמודדות עם האלימות.
סיוע מיידי בשעת משבר ובניית תוכנית הגנה אישית.
יעוץ וסיוע לנפגעי ולנפגעות אלימות במשפחה.
טיפול אישי, קבוצתי ומשפחתי.
קבוצות טיפול ותמיכה לנשים, לגברים החשופים לאלימות במשפחה. קבוצת למידה שליטה בכעסים לגברים בעלי התנהגות אלימה - וקבוצות תמיכה טיפוליות - לנשים נפגעות מאלימות.
יעוץ והדרכה לשירותים הקהילתיים בתחומי הטיפול ומניעת אלימות במשפחה.
טיפול בנפגעי תקיפה מינית.
יצירת קשר:
כתובת: אברהם הילל 8, מתחם עש אדמונד לוי, רמלה.
טבלת אנשי קשר - מרכז אזורי לשלום המשפחה
שםתפקידטלפוןמיילעוס זנה אבאיבמנהלת המרכז08-9771465zana@ramle.org.il

consumer: Hello
agent: Hello, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi
consumer: I'm not really here for myself
agent: for whom?
consumer: a close friend
consumer: it is possible to make an appointment
agent: for whom?
consumer: A close friend of mine
consumer: that really already broke in front of me
agent: How can I help?
consumer: I want to make an appointment
agent: I understand you want to help. Regarding scheduling a meeting, your friend should schedule it. He has to make the move.
consumer: ok, I'll talk to him to do it
consumer: Are the meetings done discreetly? 
and with whom the meetings
agent: The meetings are personal and nothing comes out. You can contact an assistance center located nearby or in the city of residence. where does the friend live
consumer: sand God
agent: contacting the assistance center for victims and victims of sexual assault Tair - Shefala print e-mail
Helpline: 08-9496020 - The line is active 24 hours, 7 days a week. 
Email: donation@tair1202.org
Fax: 08-9496025
Address: P.O. 1273 Rehovot 7611201
agent: It is also possible to contact welfare in Ramla for the injured. And they can help set up a meeting for your friend.
agent: The Center for Family Peace
A regional center that serves the residents of Ramla and aims to provide assistance, counseling and treatment to families in which violent marital dynamics exist. The center provides tools for establishing assertive communication patterns, anger control, and accompanies the process of exiting the cycle of violence. Individual therapy, group therapy women men children.
The goals of the center
the cessation of violence Within the family (when the focus is - violence between spouses).
Advocacy and prevention through increasing awareness among professionals and the public - of the phenomenon of domestic violence.
Holding workshops for the population in the city.
The services offered at the center:
Direct treatment - with an emphasis on risk assessment - at the beginning of the process, and later providing tools to deal with the violence.
Immediate assistance in times of crisis and building a personal protection plan.
Counseling and assistance to victims of domestic violence.
Individual, group and family therapy.
Treatment and support groups for women, for men exposed to domestic violence. Anger control learning group for men with violent behavior - and therapeutic support groups - for women affected by violence.
Consulting and training for community services in the fields of treatment and management Time of domestic violence.
Treatment of victims of sexual assault.
contact:
Address: Avraham Hillel 8, Es Edmond Levy Complex, Ramla.
Contact table - Regional Center for Family Peace
NamePositionTelephoneE-mailAos Zana Abba, Director of the Center08-9771465zana@ramle.org.il
consumer: I prefer a discreet place first of all 
And not a crowded welfare building
agent: The meetings are not held in a crowded place. This is such a sensitive issue that the contact is made over the phone and the place is not crowded. It's a domestic violence center and it's clear to the public that the issue is discreet. You can also contact Tair, I gave you the details.
agent: sorry, not you. Your boyfriend
consumer: great thanks
Agent: Good luck. Hope your friend finds a solution

transcriptConsumer:
היי
ערב טוב
קוראים לי שירי
אני בעיבוד נוסף של משהו שקרה מזמן
לא נכנסת לפרטים, אספר לך חלק:
פתחתי את הסיפור שלי בעקבות חברה שנפגעה מאותו אדם, אז יצא שבמשך תקופה הייתי אוזן קשבת בשבילה יותר ממה שבאמת היו לי כוחות.
תודה על העדכון
אז רציתי לשאול, אבל אם לא שייך אל תעני -
מה את ונשים אחרות בתפקיד שלך עושות בסוף משמרת?
איך מחזיקות מעמד אחרי כל מה שאתן שומעות?
(היה שם משהו לא הדדי, לקח מעל לחצי שנה עד שהסברתי לה שלא סתם אני היחידה שמאמינה לה)
חוסר הדדיות זה דבר שמתאים בסיטואציה כמו זו עכשיו או כמו עם מטפל, לא משהו שמתאים בין חברות.
לכן גם אני לא מרגישה בנוח להתייעץ עם אף חברה אחרת, כי זה לא שייך שאספר למישהי דברים אישיים לא שלי.
אבל מטפלים כן יש להם כלים ומעגל תמיכה, אני לא דמות טיפולית ונקלעתי לתפקיד בטעות.
טוב, תודה רבה! מניחה שאת מסיימת משמרת.
כן, זה דובר והיא התנצלה יפה. אבל מאז נהיה שאני קצת טריגר בשבילה, היא קצת טריגר בשבילי, קצת התרחקנו וכל אחת בסביבה חברתית אחרת.
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
Agent: Hi
consumer: Good evening
Agent: Good evening
consumer: My name is Shiri
agent: Hi Shiri, how are you?
consumer: I'm reworking something that happened a long time ago
agent: I will be happy to help as much as I can, it's just important for me to say in advance that my shift ends at 20:00 and another volunteer will be here until 23:00
consumer: I didn't go into details, I'll tell you part:
I opened my story following a friend who was hurt by that person, so it turned out that for a period of time I was a listening ear for her more than I really had the strength.
consumer: Thanks for the update
agent: sounds very complex and not simple for you
consumer: So I wanted to ask, but if it doesn't belong don't answer -
consumer: What do you and other women in your position do at the end of a shift? How do you hold on after everything you hear?
consumer: (There was something non-reciprocal there, it took over six months until I explained to her that I'm not the only one who believes her)
agent: We support each other if necessary.
agent: I understand you, how do you feel about the lack of reciprocity?
consumer: Lack of reciprocity is something that is appropriate in a situation like this now or like with a therapist, not something that is appropriate between friends.
That's why I also don't feel comfortable consulting with any other company, because it doesn't belong for me to tell someone personal things that aren't mine.
But therapists do have tools and a support circle, I'm not a therapeutic figure and I got into the position by mistake.
consumer: good, thank you very much! Guess you're finishing a shift.
agent: I can understand you, to be a partner Here, such a discovery can bring with it a burden that is great for us/ wrong for us. Sometimes even in friendships there is a lack of reciprocity and then if there is good communication you can talk about it. Is this a possibility?
agent: Thank you for keeping my time
consumer: Yes, it's a speaker and she apologized nicely. But since then I've become a bit of a trigger for her, she's a bit of a trigger for me, we've drifted apart a bit and each in a different social environment.
agent: A very complex situation, sorry to stop in the middle of the conversation with you. 
Thank you for reaching out and sharing with me, good luck in the future and I hope it works out for the best for you

good evening

Thanks for the update
So I wanted to ask, but if it doesn't belong don't answer -
What do you and other women in your position do at the end of a shift?
How do you hold on after everything you hear?
(There was something non-reciprocal there, it took over six months until I explained to her that I'm not the only one who believes in her)
Lack of reciprocity is something that is appropriate in a situation like this now or like with a therapist, not something that is appropriate between friendships.
That's why I also don't feel comfortable consulting with any other company, because it doesn't belong to ASP R someone's personal things not mine.
But therapists do have tools and a support circle, I'm not a therapeutic figure and I got into the position by mistake.
I'm good, thank you very much! Guess you're finishing a shift.
Yes, it's a speaker and she apologized nicely. But since then I've become a bit of a trigger for her, she's a bit of a trigger for me, we've drifted apart a bit and each in a different social environment.

אבל אני מנסה להבין משהו וכדי להבין אותו אני הולכת מכל מיני כיוונים שלו וזאת תהייה שהייתה לי
יש לך דרך לדעת מי אני? לראות תמונת פרופיל/את השם בוואצפ?…
אוקיי
אני אגיד את האמת
ממש הייתי שמחה לשתף אבל אני מתה מפחד שאני מכירה אותך… אני מכירה לפחות אדם אחד במרכז סיוע… קצת מתלבטת מה לעשות
טוב אני אקח את הסיכון נראה לי… ראיתי שיש צ׳אט אנונימי באתר אבל לא הצלחתי להפעיל אותו (לפחות לא מהטלפון)
אוקיי טוב לשמוע
אני חווה פלאשבקים בעקבות הטרדה שעברתי לפני שנה וחצי. הפלאשבקים התחילו לא מזמן אחרי שבפעם הראשונה בחיי סיפרתי על אירוע שקרה כשהייתי קטנה…
בגדול מה שהיה זה שהייתי אצל חברה שלי כשהיינו בנות 8-9 ועוד אחת מהכיתה שלנו (שלא אהבתי בכלל) הייתה שם
בסופו של דבר האחת שלא אהבתי הכריחה אותי לשבת עלייה כשהיא שכבה על המיטה וממש לעשות תנועות כמו שעושים בסקס והיא צחקה עליי שאני לא מסוגלת וכל מיני דברים. בנתיים חברה שלי ישבה בצד והסתכלה
כביכול לא קרה כלום
זה היה סתם משחק תמים של ילדות בנות 9
הבעיה היא שאני ממש זוכרת את כל מה שהרגשתי תוך כדי וזאת הייתה תחושה נוראית…
וכמובן שעכשיו כולי רועדת ואני מרגישה כאילו הוציאו לי את כל האוויר מהגוף
דרך אגב גם מה שמפחיד אותי הוא שזה אמיתי
לא זכרתי את זה עד ממש לאחרונה
וסתם מפחיד שזה אמיתי וקרה
עכשיו זאת הייתה בערך הפעם השלישית
כן מאוד
בסדר כזה
אני קצת בעיניינים אחרים פה אז אני לא יכולה שזה ישפיע עליי
אחרי הפעם הראשונה התחילו לי פלאשבקים לאירוע אחר בכלל שנשארו עד היום
השבוע היה פלאשבק ממש ממש ממש קשוח והייתי עם המרכזת שלי של התואר והיא הייתה סופר חמודה
אבל אז היא שאלה האם קרה לי עוד משהו חוץ ממה שאמרתי לה (על האירוע השני שיש לי פלאשבקים אליו) ולא ידעתי מה לענות
כן? לא? האם זה באמת קרה? האם זה באמת נחשב? האם זאת הסיבה שהאירוע השני שבגדול לא היה חמור כלכך עדיין משפיע עליי שנה וחצי אחרי?
כן הגוף זוכר הכל…
אני כן בטוחה שהזיכרון שלי נכון
אבל האם זה באמת היה משהו שהטריד אותי עד כדי כך? בגלל זה הדבר החדש התקבל בצורה הרבה יותר גרועה?
כן בהחלט
אבל הספקתי לשכוח את זה
כאילו להדחיק את האירוע ממש
רק לאחרונה נזכרתי בו
כן הגיוני
כן אני מטופלת אצל פסיכולוגית
וגם כמו שאמרתי המרכזת שלי של התואר מעורבת
למעשה בעיקר רציתי להבין האם זה לגיטימי מה שאני מרגישה
האם דברים שילדה בת 9 הכריחה אותי לעשות יכולים להשפיע עליי ככה היום
:)
תודה רבה
אני שמחה שעשיתי את זה למרות שפחדתי
זה סידר לי כמה דברים בראש
חלק גדול ממה שהרגשתי הוא אשמה ובושה ופחד שאלה לא דברים שהרגשתי אחרי האירוע השני בגלל הגיל, הקשר והמין של הצד השני
אבל העובדה שאני מרגישה בגוף רק מלכתוב את מה שהיה…
משתדלת לסמוך עליי
שוב תודה
תודה
תדעי שעשית למישהו את היום :)
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi
I wanted to ask a question
agent: Hi, feel free to ask
consumer: It's a bit strange
But in the most genuine way because I'm trying to understand in terms of logic, what is considered sexual harassment? Anything related to sex/sexuality that subjectively felt unpleasant?
consumer: What I'm trying to say is that I once went through something and I'm really trying to understand whether a. It is considered'
B. The subjective feeling is the only thing?
consumer: I know that something doesn't need to be 'considered' to know that it was unpleasant
But I'm trying to understand something and to understand it I go from all kinds of directions and that's a question I had
agent: That's right, you're right. If someone initiates a sexual relationship with you and not by your choice or desire, then it is considered harassment. character The context will actually define if it is harassment/assault etc.
It is important to listen to your subjective feeling
agent: would you like to share maybe?
consumer: Do you have a way to know who I am? See a profile picture/the name on WhatsApp?…
agent: The line is in principle anonymous, we do not ask the person who applies for personal details unless it is her choice and desire. 
It is important for me to be honest and let you know that the name that appears on your WhatsApp also appears on our screen, but we do not use it, sometimes only in certain cases of an event/distress and even then it will always be in your knowledge. 
We engrave in our hearts and also in our professional training to respect your privacy.
consumer: ok
I will tell the truth
I would be really happy to share but I'm scared to death that I know you... me I know at least one person in an aid center... I'm a bit confused about what to do
agent: I understand your dilemma
consumer: Well, I'll take the risk, I think... I saw that there was an anonymous chat on the site, but I couldn't activate it (at least not from the phone)
agent: I do not pass on the content of the conversation and there is a very, very high level of discretion between the volunteers. We also often don't know each other. I don't think we know each other
consumer: ok good to hear
agent: You are in a safe place, I promise you
agent: And you are welcome to share as much as you like, there is no pressure
consumer: I'm having flashbacks following the harassment I went through a year and a half ago. The flashbacks started not long ago after, for the first time in my life, I told about an event that happened approx When I was little...
consumer: basically what happened was that I was at my friend's house when we were 8-9 years old and another one from our class (whom I didn't like at all) was there
In the end, the one I didn't like forced me to sit up while she was lying on the bed and literally make movements like you do in sex and she laughed at me for not being able to and all kinds of things. In the meantime, my friend sat on the side and watched
consumer: As if nothing happened
It was just an innocent game of 9-year-old girls
The problem is that I really remember everything I felt while doing it and it was a terrible feeling...
consumer: And of course now I'm shaking all over and I feel as if all the air has been taken out of my body
agent: I'm with you, your feeling and feeling that you feel now, this overflow is understandable so much. The body remembers and it shows it
agent: It's a real experience what you experienced, it happened and it's real. Even if you were 9 years old and innocent, this is still not an appropriate situation or respectful of personal space and body. Playing with a sexual character in a situation like you describe can be very stressful and disturbing
agent: Try to take a breath, maybe drink water, which can help you deal with body sensations
consumer: By the way, what scares me is that it's real
agent: what do you mean?
consumer: I didn't remember that until very recently
consumer: And it's just scary that it's real and true
agent: I understand your fear
agent: You said you told about the case for the first time, how was it for you?
consumer: Now that was about the third time
agents: You are very brave in my eyes for sharing, I'm sure it's a complex experience in itself
consumer: Yes, very much
agent: how do you feel now?
consumer: That's fine
consumer: I'm a bit preoccupied with other matters here, so I can't let it affect me
agent: Completely understandable. If you want to stop or continue later, feel free to say so
consumer: After the first time, I started having flashbacks to a completely different event that remain to this day
consumer: This week there was a really, really tough flashback and I was with my degree coordinator and she was super cute
consumer: But then she asked if anything else had happened to me besides what I told her (about the second incident to which I have flashbacks) and I didn't know what to answer
agent: I think it makes sense, years that he predicted You kept this secret and only recently did you give it space, recognition, the body connects to the feelings it went through when you were a child, and it remembers and signals to you
Consumer: Yes? No? Did it really happen? Does it really count? Is this the reason that the second major incident was not so serious and still affects me a year and a half later?
consumer: Yes, the body remembers everything...
agent: Do you mean that you don't feel safe in the memory you had at the age of 9?
agent: When there is an unprocessed experience and we go through a similar experience, then it is very logical that it will have an effect, even after a while...
consumer: I'm sure my memory is correct
consumer: But was it really something that bothered me that much? Is that why the new thing was received so much worse?
agent: Sounds like already then b Age 9 Your body sensations and feeling were very clear to you
consumer: Yes, absolutely
consumer: But I managed to forget it
consumer: as if suppressing the actual event
consumer: I only recently remembered it
agent: Everyone experiences things differently. Sometimes the intensity is too great, the body protects itself and uses defense mechanisms to not deal with the pressure/pain/sense of danger. As you wrote - repression
agent: Is there anyone who supports you on this issue?
consumer: Yes, that makes sense
consumer: Yes, I am being treated by a psychologist
consumer: And as I said, my coordinator of the degree is involved
agent: I'm glad to hear that you are receiving support and that the coordinator supports you
consumer: actually I mainly wanted to understand if it is legitimate what I am from sensitive
Can things that a 9-year-old girl forced me to do affect me like this today?
agent: definitely legitimate
consumer: :)
agent: smiling back at you :)
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: You're welcome, thank you for your courage and honesty to contact and write
consumer: I'm glad I did it even though I was scared
It cleared up a few things in my mind
agent: I'm glad you feel that way
consumer: A large part of what I felt was guilt and shame and fear, these are not things I felt after the second incident because of the age, relationship and gender of the other party
consumer: But the fact that I feel in my body just from writing what was...
agent: True, as you wrote, the body remembers everything. 
I understand the feeling of guilt and shame, unfortunately these often accompany sexual abuse One way or another. You didn't do anything wrong, you were a girl, and it sounds to me that you got into a difficult and complex situation and your body protected itself then, and also years later. Give yourself the legitimacy as well, trust your feelings.
consumer: trying to trust me
Thanks again
agent: in your time...
agent: my shift is about to end, another volunteer will be here until 23:00. I wish you only the best in the future.
consumer: Thank you
Know that you made someone's day :)
agent: You are charming, my heart smiles at you

consumer: Hi. I wanted to find out if there are support groups for victims in Tel Aviv?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi
consumer: I wanted to find out if there are support groups for victims in Tel Aviv?
consumer: victims of maturity
agent: I can find out for you, do you feel comfortable writing me your age?
consumers: 30
consumer: It is also possible in combination with yoga. I saw that there is one too..
agent: I know support groups for post-trauma combined with yoga, I don't know for assault victims. I will get back to you with an answer
consumer: the main thing is a group. What there is..(:
agent: I understand you
agent: Hi, I suggest you call 1202, this is our help line, of the help centers. If you are in Tel Aviv then come to the assistance center of Tel Aviv and they will be able to give you all the details. 
If you prefer that they get back to you, I will ask you for additional details, name and phone number, and we can transfer to an assistance coordinator for further treatment
consumer: I will call. Thanks.
agent: That's fine, good luck, I hope you find a group that suits you
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: No problem, we are here for you and with you

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hello
Consumer: Yes
agent: Hi, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi
consumer: I wanted to consult a little
agent: Sure, feel free to write
consumer: I filed a complaint with the police some time ago.. 
I believe that all the women who file a complaint with the police are in tension about what will happen next
consumer: Will he be indicted, will there be justice, etc
consumer: I wanted to know how to really overcome these thoughts or at least know how to deal with them
consumer: I don't want to bother the investigators and the instructor of the assistance for the criminal track, so I don't call to find out what the status of the case is... but what do we do in the meantime? The expectation and the desire for things to progress are strong and occupy the thoughts most of the time
agent: I understand you, and yes, it makes a lot of sense, Shay There was busyness and tension around the wait. It makes sense that the head and heart are busy with this
agent: May I ask if you applied independently or received assistance through some assistance center?
consumer: I received assistance from Rehovot. They transferred the investigation file to Rishon Lezion, so now I have to update myself through the Tel Aviv Assistance Center
consumer: Assistance from the Tair Assistance Center
consumer: Do you know how long treatment usually takes for investigations?
agent: I understand, do you have an address to contact at the assistance center in Tel Aviv to ask?
agent: Unfortunately, it changes and is dynamic
consumer: Yes, but I don't want to bother them. 
Two weeks ago, the assistance coordinator told me that the investigations would get back to me on Tuesday of last week, but they haven't gotten back to me until today
agent: It's fine, you can Call to ask if there is any progress and to direct the questions on the subject to the coordinator of escorting in the criminal procedure to whom you were referred.
consumer: It won't make them angry and we didn't handle the case properly?
consumer: *do ​​not handle
agent: No, they are all very professional and dedicated and understand the stress they are under when they turn to an assistance center
consumer: Ok.. I'll try to do it tomorrow.. I wish I'd get answers.
I have another question about social security
consumer: I want to submit an acknowledgment from National Insurance for what I went through.
Who do I turn to from the assistance to help me with this?
agent: I would ask through the assistance center in Tel Aviv who can direct you to a claim from National Insurance
consumer: I understand
consumer: Thank you very much for the answer 
agent: You're welcome, we are here for you
agent: Good luck, I hope the issue progresses in a good and correct way for you
consumer: Amen! 
thank you very very much

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, did I reach the hotline for victims of sexual assault?
Agent: Hi. Yes
agent: I'm with you
consumer: I've been thinking for a long time whether I should seek help..
Two and a half years ago I was raped.
consumer: why kind of? Because there was no use of force on his part
I just didn't do anything
agent: It sounds difficult to keep it inside for two years. It's good that you contacted us.
consumer: I don't even think that person understood how hurt I was by that
consumer: Even before the incident, I was mentally challenged, schizophrenic.
agent: Rape is not always the use of force, in such cases many people freeze and fail to respond
agent: And I'm sure the experience was very difficult for you
consumer: Now I have nightmares about it at night
wonder Sparkles when I sleep with my husband
Crying fits
consumer: And a terrible feeling of disconnection from myself.. I don't feel my body
Need to cut to feel something
agent: You describe a very difficult and natural experience after an attack, things sometimes emerge after a period.
consumer: I don't know what to do to get out of this nightmare
agent: And the need to cut is to focus on physical pain and not mental pain
agent: I am here with you and we will think together about what is right and suitable for you
agent: are you with me?
Consumer: Yes
agent: Have you ever partnered with someone?
consumer: I just don't know what options there are?
consumer: I shared Billy
agent: your husband?
Consumer: Yes
agent: And how did he get it?
consumer: At first not good.. He said that if I don't go to the regime He broke up with me.
consumer: After that he talked to his father and softened
agent: did you go to therapy?
consumer: Now he is the one who encouraged me to seek help
agent: It's good to hear that your husband is with you and encourages you and wants you to get help.
consumer: I am being treated by a psychiatrist
And there is also a psychologist who is quite difficult for me to open up to
agent: You don't feel comfortable with her?
consumer: not really..
consumer: I was also in several hospitalizations before and after the incident
consumer: psychiatric hospitalizations
agent: It sounds like you went through a difficult time and it's good that you're currently trying to find a way to deal with it, asking for help is also a lot of strength
consumer: Yes... I feel like I've almost reached the bottom
agent: So from here you can only go up, is your nanny new?
co nsumer: No, I have been treated by her for over a year
agent: sometimes it's chemistry with a therapist, have you talked to her about the fact that it's hard for you to open up to her or that you don't feel comfortable with it?
consumer: yes we talked about it a bit
agent: It's good that you shared. I think that a psychiatrist and a psychologist can maybe help. It's also good that you come here so that we can talk a little about things.
agent: When you feel that way, what makes you feel a little better anyway?
consumer: I like to read books
agent: what do you like to read? What do you call Ekhdin?
Agent: Now
consumer: I just finished a book by the writer Andy Jackson Bolly King
agent: recommend?
consumer: Yes, a really nice book
agent: I'll check it out.
agent: Have you ever gone to a support group? Consumer: No
agent: Would you like me to check if there is a support group in your area of ​​residence?
consumer: I would love to
consumer: I live in Bat Yam
agent: I'm from the north and I don't know about groups there, but I leave them a message and they get back to you. is that ok with you
consumer: yes, no problem. How will they get back to me? on the phone? on WhatsApp?
agent: phone if you agree to call you
consumer: yes it is possible, preferably in the morning
agent: I will write to them. What is your phone number and name?
consumer: 0584550182
Maria
agent: I will pass it on to them. Hope a group opens soon. I don't know how to say. But I'm glad you turned, don't stay with the pain alone.
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: If you want to talk more I'm here until 11:00 PM and in the meantime I wish you A calm evening
consumer: ok. Thanks

consumer: Hi, I have a question about submitting a disability to the National Insurance
consumer: If I file for general disability for post-trauma following sexual trauma, I should choose to file for disability based on mental illness or choose based on being a victim of sexual assault
agent: Good evening, regarding submitting a claim to the National Insurance, it is recommended under sexual assault victim, because then the reference is more accurate, and there are committees that are specific to victims. However, it is best to use a social worker who is an expert in the exploitation of rights. In addition, at an assistance center in the area where you live, they will either be able to help you or refer you to Oss from the health fund or the authority, you should dial 1202, during the day and ask to consult with a coordinator on the matter. In addition, the National Insurance has the Yad Mech services Venat - representatives who help in filing claims, and maybe they can explain better.
consumer: Thank you very much
Agent: Good luck!

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, I already talked to you yesterday, I just always help out 5 minutes before the end of the shift, but I'm already desperate
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: I spoke with a representative yesterday, it was just 5 minutes before the end of my shift, I'm already desperate, I don't know what to do anymore
agent: we can talk. At eight a shift begins with another volunteer who will be on the line until 11 p.m
consumer: ok
agent: It sounds like you are confused and in great distress
consumer: Since I opened the issue a few days ago, I'm really confused about what to do to whom to tell the heart, I want to get it out but I don't know how
agent: It sounds very lonely to stay with the thoughts and the memory and something blocks you from sharing and talking about what you went through
consumer: Yes, I wanted to I went to complain but as I get to the station something stops me
agent: It is very difficult to gather strength and deal with filing a complaint
consumer: So what do we do with it, I already have to release it
agent: There are people near you that you can share and tell them about the injury
consumer: I'm from a religious home, I can't tell
agent: It's hard to tell about sexual abuse. in every house
agent: sometimes it's easier to share with a good friend, sister or other person you trust who can listen to you
consumer: They won't do anything, I'm afraid of the reaction
agent: You are afraid of hurting them, from their reaction towards you
Consumer: Yes
consumer: How do you tell something like that?
agent: It is very difficult to tell because the injury is very severe. Feelings of guilt often arise, how could I not breathe Rathi how I did not recognize, helplessness
agent: At the same time, it is impossible to prepare for a particularly violent and disrespectful act from a person who earned our trust and he betrayed him
consumer: He betrayed my trust, we were good friends
agent: sounds very painful and insulting
consumer: very nobody understands how much
agent: Unfortunately, I have to end the conversation in the middle. Would you like to continue chatting with the volunteer who is now starting her shift?
Consumer: Yes
agent: I'll put you back on the line and shortly a volunteer will call you back. In the meantime, I'm saying goodbye to you
consumer: Thank you
agent: Good evening, sorry for the wait, I'm here with you now. I understand from the correspondence with the previous assistant, that you really want to share something that happened to you, but it's not easy....
agent : Good evening, I'm still here. if you want to chat
consumer: Good evening, I finally listened to you and I'm at the police station
agent: Hi, usually it's better to file a complaint during the day, so we can also send an escort with you to be by your side. Have you come to the police now to file a complaint?
consumer: Yes, I'm with my sister
consumer: I have a question
agent: Good to have your sister with you. What is the question?
consumer: If it ends up in court, I don't want to see it... When they tell me that I have to verify in front of them, I prefer not to file
consumer: Now there is no one here to ask. A police officer takes my first testimony and passes it on to the investigator
agent: As a rule, in court you see the accused, and sometimes also during the police investigation. This is a really important question and maybe It is worthwhile for you to talk first with the coordinator at the assistance center, who will answer all these questions for you, before you file a complaint
consumer: How do you contact her?
agent: have you started yet?
consumer: Now it should start
consumer: Hi, this is Shilat's sister
agent: It's better to tell the policewoman that in order to come with an escort from the aid center, come another day
Agent: Hi
consumer: The problem is that now he must have the courage to submit his understanding. It took time to be convinced
agent: I understand that she has courage, and that is important, but the investigation and the procedure are not simple, and it is better to arrive mentally prepared and understand what the procedure entails.
agent: The coordinator at the aid center will be able to meet with you and explain what the procedure includes and also connect you with a volunteer who can sit with you during the questioning with the researcher
agent: And also explain what her rights are as a victim of a crime
agent: It's better to come prepared.
agent: Would you like to speak with a coordinator from the religious or normal aid center?
agent: It is important to know that after you file the complaint, as a rule, the process begins to move by the police and then by the attorney's office.
agent: Hi, I'm still here. are you done
consumer: Yes, I'm done now
Agent: Nice. How was?
consumer: difficult
agent: And what did they say about the sequel?
consumer: There was no investigator, so a police officer took a testimony, tomorrow it will go to the investigator
Agent: I understand. I really recommend, before you continue, to call 1202 and ask to speak with the escort coordinator. She will be able to provide guidance and assistance throughout the entire process.
agent: And you can use the hub from the Sio center of religious and ultra-orthodox women, if you prefer
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: the escort coordinator is very professional and in contact with all the police stations in the area of ​​the assistance center. What station were you at now?
consumer: Lod
Agent: I understand. Azorchen's assistance center is located in Rehovot. offers to use them. Send you their details?
Consumer: Yes. I am currently in a storm of emotions tomorrow morning I will check everything
agent: Well done for daring to file the complaint. It makes sense that you are in a storm of emotions. Tomorrow you can get organized and contact the assistance center. They will accompany you as much as you want. And any question - you can consult their coordinator. This is the phone - either 1202 or 08-9496020
agent: I wish you a good night
consumer: thank you good night

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, I talked to you yesterday and the shift just ended
agent: Hello, I'm here on duty
consumer: Hi, good evening, I contacted you yesterday and it was at the end of a shift
consumer: I'm really confused what to do
agent: I understand that you are in a somewhat confused state, listening
consumer: I honestly don't know where to start
consumer: It really stresses me out
agent: I completely understand, the confusion is stressful and doesn't allow you to think in an orderly way sometimes, take a few breaths and organize your thoughts, maybe write on a page in dots, I'm here waiting, no pressure
consumer: I'll tell you the truth, I've already done this, but it doesn't help
consumer: I'm confused whether to tell my partner or not and whether to go to the police
consumer: This really confuses me agent: The decision is yours, it is true that it is confusing and difficult to decide, but you have to do things at your own pace. I completely understand that you are now helpless and don't know what to do, only you know your partner and know if he is a person you can lean on in such confusing and difficult moments. Sometimes just sharing already gives great support, if your partner is there with you it will be a lot easier, but then again you know who is better than me. Personally, I think that sharing a good friend makes it much easier and you can continue to debate together with him about your second question, which is whether to file a police complaint. This is also a difficult question and I completely understand your hesitation on the one hand you thought he was a good friend, on the other hand you feel he hurt you and you don't want him to continue such actions, I understand you so much.
agent: Unfortunately my shift ends soon, I hope I was able to help a little, you can contact us by phone 24/7 hours a day at number 1202 or by WhatsApp tomorrow from 5 p.m.
agent: Finishing now, may you have nothing but good
consumer: Amen, thank you

consumer : and where there is reliable information on the subject
agent: can use the email listed for her, I assume they will be able to give you information, I understand that you are interested in knowing details about a place in the area where you are.
consumer: Yes, I am in Madrid. Can I get all this information via email?
agent: try writing to the email, at the same time trying to check with our coordinator who can be contacted
consumer: Thank you very much
agent: I checked with the coordinator the answer to your question: if you are staying for a while in Madrid you should contact your insurance company where you did your health insurance to ask where you can perform the test in Madrid something like before in Israel, if you are returning to Israel in the next few days, you can wait for the return and then perform the test in Israel The test and if necessary you will receive antibiotic treatment, everything is a Levi in ​​your plans later. In any case, you also have the email and phone number that I sent you. Hope I answered your questions
agent: Good luck, take care of yourself and feel good
consumer: Just how long do you have to wait before doing the test?
agent: I didn't quite understand your question, why do you have to wait before the test, if you fear that you have contracted some kind of disease, you should get tested when you arrive in Israel or get in touch with the insurance company to find out if they finance such a test abroad and where.
Agent: Good luck
agent: Currently ending the call, I hope you received a response that can help you continue to address the problem.

בבקשה תתקשרי ישירות למרכז הסיוע בתל אביב, שם תוכלי לקבל מידע בנוגע להגשת תלונה ולליווי על ידי מתנדבת וכן לשוחח עם הרכזת.  03-5176176.
בסדר?
transcriptAll_en:
agent: Hi Shiri, have a good week. 
My name is Neta and I am the coordinator of legal proceedings at the Haifa Assistance Center. The volunteer you spoke with yesterday evening forwarded your request to me and I forwarded it to Tel Aviv. The Tel Aviv coordinator tried to call you both today and last week, and there was no answer. (tried to call both confidentially and from her office number).
Please call the assistance center in Tel Aviv directly, where you can get information about filing a complaint and being accompanied by a volunteer, as well as talk to the coordinator.  03-5176176.
OK?

היו שואלים אותי כמה נאנסתי ביום שירות טראומאטי בה״ח ברזילי אגב שם אושפזתי במחלקה פסיכיאטרית אהל הטראומה היא מהשירות לאומי שם באורולוגיה

החלום שלי זה להיות מעצבת פנים לפני רציתי להיות אחות אחרי מה שעברתי כוח עזר בת שירות לאומי ברזילי ירד לי החשק
כן למרות באישפוז פסיכיאטרי עזרתי המון לאחיות בהיתנדבות בתור מאושפזת אבל זה לא אותו דבר כמו עובדת שם

אפילו עוסית מבקשת אישור רישות לפני שהיא פונה לפסיכיאטר/ית

transcriptAll:
consumer: היי אני אשמח לדבר עכשיו
consumer: 
agent: ערב טוב, אני איתך עכשיו
consumer: מה שלומך?
agent: תודה, תרצי לשתף איך את מרגישה
consumer: כן
consumer: קוראים לי אליה, אני בת 16
ב13 ליולי 2022 ,הייתי לבד עם אבא שלי בבית, (אבא שלי עם דיכאון כבר הרבה זמן) ויצאנו למסעדת פאב שכונתית כזאת, אבא שלי שתה בירה ולא היה מפוקס
והיית מצפה שאבא שלך יגן עלייך, וזה לא קרה.
הגיע מישהו, והוא התחיל ללטף לי את היד ולנסות לגעת לי בחזה. קפאתי. באיזשהו שלב יצאנו, הגעתי הביתה, התקלחתי, ובכיתי הרבה.
הרגשתי שאני יכולה להאשים אותו על זה, ולא אותי על העובדה שקפאתי. כי מבחינתי הוא היה צריך להגן עליי. 
אבא שלי בדיכאון כבר כמה שנים, את מכתב ההתאבדות שלו מצאתי השנה ביומולדת שלי, ואמא שלי לא מטפלת בעניין כי היא אחרי סרטן עם נזק פיזי ונפשי. מצפים ממני לדאוג לשניהם ואני עושה את זה אבל זה פוגע בי. כשביקשתי מאמא טיפול פסיכולוגי, היא צחקה לי בפרצוף.
ב18 ביולי 2023 טסתי למשלחת לארצות הברית, חלק גדול ממנה היה גם להתרחק מהבית. 
היה לנו שישבת אחד במשלחת, ובחמישי לפני השישבת הגענו למחנה לילה באזור פנסילבניה, רצו שנתערבב עם האמריקאים במחנה, וחילקו את כל המחנה לזוגות, לכל זוג הביאו דף עם שאלות כדי להכיר יותר טוב.
הייתי עם מישהו שקראו לו ג׳ואל, באנו להתיישב על הדשא, התיישבתי בישיבה מזרחית ושנייה אחרי שהתיישבתי גואל נשכב עליי, שם את הראש לו על הכתף שלי, שילב ידיים ונגע לי בחזה, אמרתי לו שאני לא מרגישה בנוח, הוא לא דיבר, לא זז, הזזתי אותו. 
ולא זזתי משם. קפאתי. שוב. אבל הבעיה זה שהפעם לא היה לי מישהו להאשים מלבד עצמי. לא היה לי את מי להאשים שלא הגן עליי כי זה היה רק אני והוא.
הוא התחיל לקרוא את השאלות, הוא לא הפסיק לדבר על סקס ודברים בסגנון, הוסיף שאלות, עד שבאיזשהו שלב לקחתי את הדף. קראתי את השאלה האחרונה וברחתי משם.
 מהמשך המשלחת עד עכשיו, אני אוכלת את עצמי על הסיטואציה הזאת, יש לי לפחות התקף חרדה אחד כל יום, אני לא אוכלת, אני לא יוצאת מהמיטה, ויש עוד הרבה מסביב שפשוט מחלחל, ואני לא מצליחה לגייס את הכוחות להמשיך, אני לא מצליחה להסתכל לאבא שלי בעיניים
כל נגיעה גם אם זה מהאנשים שאני הכי אוהבת ורוצה לידי פשוט מקפיצה אותי
וזה מחרפן אותי שהתגובה כזאת חריפה הרי זה לא אירוע כזה חריף.
זה החוסר השליטה העצמית שלי וחוסר השליטה על הסיטואציה מחרפן אותי, אני לא יודעת מה להרגיש וקשה לי עם זה
ואין לי ממי לבקש עזרה
ואני לא מתכוונת לבקש טיפול פסיכולגי מההורים כי פעם קודמת הם צחקו לי בפרצוף
ואני תקועה במין לופ שאני לא מצליחה לצאת ממנו
ואני מתחרפנת
consumer: סליחה על המגילה
agent: אליה יקרה, כתבת על דברים כל כך רגישים. קראתי כל מילה ודבר ראשון שחשוב שתדעי הוא שהתגובה של קפיאה כשמישהו חודר למרחב הפרטי שלנו היא תגובה טבעית. את לא אשמה בהתנהגות הזו ולמעשה זה חלק מהמגננה שלנו כשאנחנו נפגעות

agent: זה תמיד יותר קל כשמדובר בחוויה של אדם אחר. נשמע שהיכולת שלך להכיל אחרות ואחרים מאפשרת לך בלי לשים לב להתגבר על קשיי היום יום. ויחד עם זאת יש את הכאב של החוויה הפרטית, את התסכול ואת השיפוטיות על מה שעשינו או לא עשינו. כל זה טבעי
consumer: זה מתסכל אותי שזה משפיע עליי ככה
agent: יש בחוויות שסיפרת עליהן הרבה כאב וחוסר צדק, אם זה לא היה משפיע עליך זה היה אומר שהדחקת את הכאב שזה גם לא דבר טוב.
consumer: זה נכון
agent: טוב שאת כותבת ומדברת על החוויות הקשות שאת מתמודדת איתן. כתבת שרצית טיפול פסיכולוגי וההורים שלך לא מאפשרים לך. האם פנית ליועצת בית הספר בנושא
consumer: כן

ורדפתי אחריה כל יום במשך חודש שבחודש הזה הרגשתי שהמצב הנפשי שלי הולך ומתדרדר
ואז כשהגעתי למשרד שלה לפני שהספקתי להוציא מילה היא אמרה לי שאני נכשלת ושאני סתומה לכיתת מופת והפסקתי ללכת אליה 
והעניין נעצר
agent: זו התנהגות הפוכה מתמיכה של אדם אחראי ומבוגר, מרגיש שהיא לא שמעה את הכאב הפנימי שלך בכלל
agent: אולי יש מורה אחרת בכל בית הספר שתוכלי לדבר איתה על מה שאת עוברת, זה לא חייבת להיות היועצת
consumer: יש מורה בבית ספר שאכן תומכת בי

agent: החופש הגדול זו תקופה שיכולה להיות מאוד בודדת, ההרגשה שאין עם מי לדבר יכולה להיות מתסכלת

agent: אליה אני מבינה שאין באפשרותך להמשיך לשוחח כרגע. אני נפרדת ממך בשלב הזה. קו הווטסאפ זמין הערב עד שעה 23.00 או מחר משעה 17.00 ואני מזמינה אותך להמשיך לפנות אלינו כדי שלא תרגישי לבד. את מוזמנת גם להתקשר לקו הסיוע שלנו בטלפון 1202 שם תענה לך מתנדבת בכל שעה והשיחות איתנו הן אנונימיות

 מהמשך המשלחת עד עכשיו, אני אוכלת את עצמי על הסיטואציה הזאת, יש לי לפחות התקף חרדה אחד כל יום, אני לא אוכלת, אני לא יוצאת מהמיטה, ויש עוד הרבה מסביב שפשוט מחלחל, ואני לא מצליחה לגייס את הכוחות להמשיך, אני לא מצליחה להסתכל לאבא שלי בעיניים
כל נגיעה גם אם זה מהאנשים שאני הכי אוהבת ורוצה לידי פשוט מקפיצה אותי
וזה מחרפן אותי שהתגובה כזאת חריפה הרי זה לא אירוע כזה חריף.
זה החוסר השליטה העצמית שלי וחוסר השליטה על הסיטואציה מחרפן אותי, אני לא יודעת מה להרגיש וקשה לי עם זה
ואין לי ממי לבקש עזרה
ואני לא מתכוונת לבקש טיפול פסיכולגי מההורים כי פעם קודמת הם צחקו לי בפרצוף
ואני תקועה במין לופ שאני לא מצליחה לצאת ממנו
ואני מתחרפנת
סליחה על המגילה
אני יודעת ועדיין אני לא מצליחה להשלים עם העובדה שקפאתי. ואני גם לא מצליחה להבין למה אני לא מצליחה להגיד לעצמי את מה שאני אומרת לאחרות, אני ידועה בבית הספר שלי כזאת שבאים אליה לחיבוק ואני תמיד יודעת מה להגיד אבל אני פשוט לא מצליחה עכשיו
זה מתסכל אותי שזה משפיע עליי ככה
זה נכון
כן
והיא אמרה לי שאני אשב אצלה ביינתים ושאני אדבר איתה עד שתקבל הנחיות מה לעשות
ורדפתי אחריה כל יום במשך חודש שבחודש הזה הרגשתי שהמצב הנפשי שלי הולך ומתדרדר
ואז כשהגעתי למשרד שלה לפני שהספקתי להוציא מילה היא אמרה לי שאני נכשלת ושאני סתומה לכיתת מופת והפסקתי ללכת אליה 
והעניין נעצר
יש מורה בבית ספר שאכן תומכת בי 
אבל אנחנו עכשיו בחופש והיא לא זמינה
זה אכן מתסכל מאוד

consumer: Hi, I'd love to talk now
consumer: 
agent: Good evening, I'm with you now
consumer: how are you?
agent: Thank you, would you like to share how you feel
Consumer: Yes
consumer: My name is Elia, I'm 16 years old
On July 13, 2022, I was alone with my father at home, (my father has been depressed for a long time) and we went to a neighborhood pub restaurant like this, my father was drinking beer and was not in a mood
And you would expect your father to protect you, and it didn't happen.
Someone came, and he started caressing my hand and trying to touch my chest. I froze. At some point we went out, I got home, took a shower, and cried a lot.
I felt like I could blame him for that, and not me for the fact that I froze. Because for me he had to protect me. 
My father is depressed For several years now, I found his suicide letter this year on my birthday, and my mother does not take care of the matter because she is after cancer with physical and mental damage. I am expected to take care of both and I do but it hurts me. When I asked my mother for psychological treatment, she laughed in my face.
On July 18, 2023, I flew on a mission to the United States, a large part of which was also to get away from home. 
We had one Shabbat in the expedition, and on the Thursday before the Shabbat we arrived at a night camp in the Pennsylvania area, they wanted us to mingle with the Americans in the camp, and divided the entire camp into pairs, each pair was given a sheet of paper with questions to get to know each other better.
I was with someone named Joel, we came to sit down on the grass, I sat down in an oriental yeshiva and a second after I sat down Goel lay down on Yi, put his head on my shoulder, put his hands together and touched my chest, I told him I didn't feel comfortable, he didn't speak, didn't move, I moved him. 
And I didn't move from there. I froze. again. But the problem is that this time I had no one to blame but myself. I had no one to blame for not protecting me because it was just me and him.
He started reading the questions, he kept talking about sex and things like that, adding questions, until at some point I took the page. I read the last question and ran away.
 From the end of the expedition until now, I've been eating myself up over this situation, I have at least one anxiety attack every day, I don't eat, I don't get out of bed, and there's a lot more around that just seeps in, and I can't muster the strength to continue I can't look my father in the eye
Every touch, even if it's one of the people I love and want next to me, just makes me jump
And it pisses me off that such a harsh reaction is not such a harsh event.
It's my lack of self-control and the lack of control over the situation that pisses me off, I don't know what to feel and it's hard for me
And I have no one to ask for help
And I'm not going to ask my parents for psychological treatment because they laughed in my face once before
And I'm stuck in a kind of loop that I can't get out of
And I'm freaking out
consumer: Sorry for the scroll
agent: Dear Elia, you wrote about such sensitive things. I read every word and the first thing that is important for you to know is that the reaction of freezing when someone invades our private space is a natural reaction Yat. You are not to blame for this behavior and in fact it is part of our defense when we are hurt
agent: You are a young woman who goes through a lot with your parents on a daily basis and at the same time you maintain a whole life and this is completely not obvious, it requires a lot of strength
consumer: I know and I still can't come to terms with the fact that I froze. And I also can't understand why I can't say to myself what I say to others, I'm known in my school as someone who comes to hug her and I always know what to say but I just can't right now
agent: It's always easier when it comes to another person's experience. It sounds like your ability to accommodate others and others allows you to overcome everyday difficulties without noticing. And at the same time there is the pain of the experience The private one, the frustration and the judgment about what we did or didn't do. It's all natural
consumer: It frustrates me that it affects me like this
agent: There is a lot of pain and injustice in the experiences you told about, if it didn't affect you it would mean that you repressed the pain which is also not a good thing.
consumer: That's right
agent: It's good that you write and talk about the difficult experiences you face. You wrote that you wanted psychological treatment and your parents won't let you. Have you contacted the school counselor about it?
Consumer: Yes
agent: It's good to have older people around you who support you
consumer: And she told me that I would sit at her place and that I would talk to her until she received instructions on what to do
And I chased her every day for a month that month I felt the situation My mental state is deteriorating
Then when I got to her office before I could say a word she told me that I was failing and that I was stuck in a master class and I stopped going to her 
And the matter stopped
agent: This is the opposite behavior from the support of a responsible and adult person, feeling that she didn't hear your inner pain at all
agent: Maybe there's another teacher in the whole school that you can talk to about what you're going through, it doesn't have to be the counselor
consumer: There is a teacher at school who does support me 
But we are now on vacation and she is not available
agent: The long vacation is a time that can be very lonely, the feeling of having no one to talk to can be frustrating
consumer: It is indeed very frustrating
agent: That's exactly what we're here for, you're not alone
agent: I am Elia I understand that you are unable to continue chatting right now. I'm breaking up with you at this point. The WhatsApp line is available tonight until 23.00 or tomorrow from 17.00 and I invite you to keep contacting us so that you don't feel alone. You are also welcome to call our helpline at 1202 where a volunteer will answer you at any hour and the conversations with us are anonymous
