האמת שלא יודעת אפילו מה עלה לי ששלחתי הודעה, הכל בגדר המשעשע בשבילי, ולפעמים יש לנו את הצורך הזה סתם ליפול על אדם כמו שנופלים עלינו במשך החיים רק ההבדל הוא ליפול על אדם שאנחנו לא מכירים אפילו ואולי לשמוע משפט שאנחנו רוצים, סתם תקווה שטותית. החיים שלי תמיד היו בלאגן אחד גדול וככה התרגלתי לחיות מהילדות והלוואי שהייתי נופלת ליהיה בסדר הזה שגורם להרבה את ההרגשה הקסומה הזאת שהיא בסך הכל אשליה כזאת או אחרת. הכוונה בלהיות נאהבת של עצמך זה לחזר אחר עצמך, לפרגן, להרים, להתאהב לאהוב לקבל ועוד. בגוף שלי נגעו המון עקב הניראות המקוללת שלי וחוסר ידע עקב חוסר אדם בריא כלשהו בחיי. והאמת? שלפעמים קשה? לפעמים מגיעות הנפילות האלה למרות כל הזיוני שכל ברשותך סלחי לי על המילה ״את חזקה״ ״מה שאת עברת״ ״איך את ככה נורמלית״. אני נלחמת מול עצמי יום ויום וזאת התשובה וכמה זה קל ליפול ברגע כמה זה קל פשוט להישאב לתוך הסוף העצוב שאמור להיות לי.
האמת היא שאפשרי, עד כה עשיתי המון שינויים בעצמי לבד, ומפיהם של פסיכולוגים שאני לא מחבבת אותם האמת שברתי חוקים שלא ניראים להם הגיונים, על פי הספר שלהם הסיפור שלי אמור להתבטא בהתנהגות שונה לחלוטין מאיך שהיא היום וזה מה שמתיש, להיות ה״בוגרת״ הזאת שנלחמת בכל מעשה שיכול להרוס אותי, להיות ה״בוגרת״ הזאת שמנסה למלא את עצמה בכלים הנכונים בלהיות האדם שאני הייתי רוצה להיות ולא האדם שהעבר שלי עיצב להיות.
כמה שינויים אפשר כבר לעשות, כמה כאב אפשר כבר להכיל, כמה אפשר לייצג את המילה ״שרדנית״ המילה המעצבנת הזאת שמסכמת את כל כולי.
צודקת וכך גם דעתי ומילותיי לכל מי שאי פעם היה צריך את עזרתי ששינוי הוא תהליך והתהליך הוא עבודה והעבודה היא רצון ומאמץ. 
האמת היא ששמעתי המון סיפורים בחיי, תמיד הייתי הפסיכולוגית בחבורה הפסיכולוגית החברה. כמה שזה משעשע המשפט לפסיכולוג דרוש פסיכולוג ולי היה קשה לממש את זה כי בסופו של דבר הרצון העז הזה שיבינו כמו שאני מבינה ומרגישה סיפורים של אחרים לא קיבל את הההבנה התואמת וזה בסדר בסך הכל, אנחנו כביכול לא מבינים במאה האחוזים או אפילו קרוב סיפור של אחר ואצלי העזרה שלי הייתה מתחלקת לשתיים, צד אחד בי שמח לראות את האדם פורח הולך בשמחה מימני והצד השני מקנא שאף אחד לא מצליח לגרום לי להרגיש כך.
לפעמים מטמטם אותי היקום הזה, האשמה הזאת שיכולה לאכול אותך על זה שלא היה לך שום אדם בוגר שישמור עלייך או לפחות יסביר לך על כל הסכנות שקיימות וכן כן זאת לא אשמתי אני יודעת
זה כבר לא יקרה בכל מקרה הלכו הניסיונות שלי בלחפש את המקום הזה
נכון.
אפילו דמות משפחתית אחת אין לי. לחפש את זה באנשים זרים בכלל קשה והאמת היא שניסיתי יותר מידי. 
האמת היא שלצערי האמון שלי נשבר כבר בסביבות גיל ה12,המחייה לצד החוסר אמון בא איתי עד עכשיו כשאני כבר בת 23, הוא נפתח קצת בפני אדם אחד והוא בת זוגתי כבר שנתיים, אדם מדהים, זוגיות בריאה. הטירלול הוא להגיע למערכת יחסים בריאה אחרי מערכות יחסים רעילות ומתעללות וכמובן שלא רק זה אלא כל המזוודה הענקית שאיתה אני בכלל מגיעה. בחיי אין אנשים קרובים, זה נע בין להרגיש את החוסר לדמות משפחתית או קירבה כזאת לבין להרגיש שאני פשוט נופלת על אדם אחד וכמובן שזה על קצה המזלג כשיש עוד המון תחושות שמעורבות בתוך זה. 
קצת איבדתי את זה עצמי כרגע במחשבות.
שונאת את הרגעים שבהם אני לא מצליחה להבין מה כואב לי יותר על מה לשים את האצבע את מה להסביר או להמחיש ובכלל.. למה הניסיון הזה להסביר.. כשככה או ככה הוא לא ישנה הרבה ובכלל מה אני עושה עכשיו כאן
תמיד סיקרן אותי מה הם הגבולות שלי, לשים קץ לחיים שלי הייתי קרובה כמה פעמים בחיי, ועדיין נשארתי להילחם כנראה בגלל הילדה הקטנה הזאת בתוכי שרוצה להילחם על חייה. לקח לי המון זמן בחיי לדעת לפנות לעזרה, והאמת היא שאף פעם לא עלה בדעתי שזה יגיע לזה שבלי לחשוב פעמיים אשלח הודעה למרכז סיוע שאפילו לא זוכרת איך הגעתי אליו.
transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Just a question.. How exactly do you manage to deal with a lot of sexual assaults? How do you manage to overcome this pain as if your body is a generator.. to be your own lover when it is standing in front of you
agent: It sounds like you are facing a great difficulty
consumer: Yes, the truth is that I watched such a trial
agent: I certainly did not expect what you wrote at the end. What does it mean to be your own lover?
consumer: The truth is that I don't even know what occurred to me that I sent a message, it's all for fun for me, and sometimes we have this need to just fall for a person like we fall for in life, the only difference is to fall for a person we don't even know and maybe hear a sentence that we want, just a hope Nonsense. My life has always been one big mess and all that I have gotten used to living since childhood and I wish I would fall into this order that causes many people this magical feeling which is just an illusion in one way or another. The meaning of being loved by yourself is to court yourself, to praise, to lift, to fall in love to love to receive and more. My body was touched by many due to my cursed appearance and lack of knowledge due to the lack of any healthy person in my life. And the truth? that sometimes it's hard? Sometimes these falls come despite all the fucking mind you have. Forgive me for the word "you're strong" "what you've been through" "how are you so normal". I fight against myself every day and this is the answer and how easy it is to fall in the moment how easy it is to just be sucked into the sad end that should be for me.
agent: I really understand the desire to hear something different. you breath At times you were very cynical and it sounds like you don't believe that change can be made.
consumer: The truth is that it's possible, so far I've made a lot of changes in myself on my own, and from the mouths of psychologists whom I don't like, the truth is that I broke rules that don't seem logical to them, according to their book, my story should be expressed in completely different behavior than it is today, and that's what's exhausting, being the This "adult" who fights every act that can destroy me, to be this "adult" who tries to fill herself with the right tools to be the person I would like to be and not the person my past shaped me to be.
consumer: How many changes can already be made, how much pain can already be contained, how much can be represented by the word "survivor" this annoying word that sums up everything about me.
agents: So you swim long distances and against the current. Sounds difficult and challenging
agent: Change is always a process.
consumer: You are right and so is my opinion and my words to anyone who has ever needed my help that change is a process and the process is work and work is desire and effort. 
The truth is that I have heard a lot of stories in my life, I was always the psychologist in the social psychologist group. As amusing as it is, the sentence for a psychologist needs a psychologist and it was difficult for me to realize it because in the end this strong desire to be understood the way I understand and feel the stories of others did not receive the corresponding understanding and that's fine overall, we supposedly do not understand another's story 100 percent or even close And with me, my help would be divided into two, one side of me was happy To see the blossoming person walking happily from my side and the other side is jealous that no one can make me feel that way.
consumer: sometimes this universe fools me, this guilt that can eat you up because you didn't have any mature person to watch over you or at least explain to you about all the dangers that exist and yes, it's not my fault, I know
agent: Such deep and true insights. Those who were able to help them won. It's right to be jealous because it spurs you on to find the one that will make you feel that way
agent: I agree with you again. Even children who grow up in a normative environment do not always get an explanation of the dangers that exist. There is a really big problem with this. And obviously the situation was extreme for you
consumer: It won't happen anymore, in any case, my attempts failed Looking for this place
consumer: true.
agent: Sounds like you're already far away. You don't trust others and teach yourself
agent: On the other hand, as you said, you need to find the right person who will be able to help you help yourself
consumer: I don't even have a single family figure. Looking for it in strangers is hard at all and the truth is that I tried too much. 
The truth is that unfortunately my trust was broken already around the age of 12, the revitalization alongside the lack of trust came with me until now when I'm already 23, he opened up a little to one person and he's been my partner for two years, an amazing person, a healthy relationship. The trick is to reach a healthy relationship after toxic and abusive relationships and of course not only that but the whole huge suitcase I come with. There are no close people in my life, it ranges from feeling the lack of a family figure or such closeness to feeling that I just fall for one person and of course it's on the edge when there are a lot of other feelings involved in it. 
I kind of lost it myself right now in my thoughts.
consumer: I hate the moments when I can't understand what hurts me more, what to put my finger on, what to explain or illustrate and in general.. why this attempt to explain.. either way it won't change much and in general what am I doing here now
consumer: I've always been intrigued by what my limits are, to end my life I was close several times in my life, and I still stayed to fight probably because of this little girl inside me who wants to fight for her life. It took me a long time In my life I know how to ask for help, and the truth is that it never occurred to me that it would come to this point that without thinking twice I would send a message to an assistance center that I don't even remember how I got to.
agent: I don't want it to sound cliché, but it sounds like you're a brave woman who does a lot and manages to pick yourself up. It is true that there are falls and it is difficult. Really happy to hear that you have a healthy and good relationship
agent: The assistance centers are there precisely to be available when someone suddenly decides to contact without thinking twice
agent: anonymous reference and allows sharing. We also offer a hotline for calls accompanied by support groups and a referral to a variety of personalized treatments.
agent: end of shift. Successfully

transcriptAll_en:
consumer: Hi, do you have support groups for victims of sexual assault?
agent: Hi, I see you want to inquire about a group. Can you specify a region in Israel?
consumer: Kiryut
agent: A group is expected to open in Karmiel in September October, could this be of interest to you?
consumer: Is there maybe a group in Haifa?
agent: In Haifa, you will open a group for spouses of victims
consumer: I'm looking for a group for me...
Agent: I understand
consumer: Is Karmiel the closest location to Kiryat?
consumer: In any case, I would love to hear more details
agent: Yes Karmiel is the closest
consumer: I would love to receive more details
agent: It is important for me to write you some updates about joining the group
agent: participation in a group is conditional on receiving individual treatment
consumer: Individual treatment with a nanny on your behalf? I have been in treatment for over a year
consumer: My therapist recommended that I contact a support group
agent: Before the group is established, personal interviews are conducted to see that what the evacuee wants matches what is planned for the group
consumer: I understand
agent: If you have a nanny it's good that's the intention
agent: Because sometimes content comes up in the group that is important to process individually
consumer: I understand
consumer: ok
agent: I put a flyer here, can you see it?
Consumer: Yes
agent: If you want, I will register you and ask that they contact you. It can take a while until a contact is made and it usually happens closer to the start of the group
consumer: Yes, I would love to
agent: there is a limit or you can get in touch at any time
consumer : Basically, it's better in the afternoon after work hours
agent: OK I'll point that out
agent: Would you like to tell me how you are doing today?
consumer: Do you need more details to register?
agent: if you're comfortable with your name, but you don't have to
consumer: Tali
Agent: Thank you
consumer: The event itself happened on February 9, 2022
consumer: And I wasn't exactly ready to admit it
consumer: I blamed myself for imagining and getting drunk and letting it happen but in reality he drugged me
consumer: To this day I sometimes think I'm imagining things. My therapist said this is common in sexual assault victims and recommended I try a support group
agent: Many girls who apply are not sure if it really happened or if they are imagining it and blaming themselves
consumer: Every time I I drink more than a glass of wine, I try to prove to myself that here I am fine
consumer: Then I drank two glasses and lost control of my body
consumer: I couldn't stand it
consumer: I threw up non-stop
consumer: I saw blurry
Agent: It's not your fault. No one has the right to drug or hire and use the other's body as they wish or take advantage of a weakness
consumer: The fact that I threw up really didn't bother him
consumer: or disgusted him
consumer: Somehow to this day I have doubts and flashbacks from that evening
agent: Did you feel that he didn't care about what was happening to you?
consumer: This is someone I knew. He came to my house, we drank some wine. About two cups. After a while I couldn't walk, I went to the bathroom to throw up, I threw up a few times, my vision was blurred Q and I said no several times. I didn't lose consciousness but I wasn't me... the body was not in control
consumer: So of course he didn't care
consumer: It turned me on
consumer: same*****
agent: He took advantage of your weakness
consumer: Then he left and left me thrown on the couch, I didn't even have the strength to get dressed or go to bed
consumer: The next day I woke up and my whole body hurt
consumer: as if I was run over by a truck
consumer: And that's it
agent: You are left with a hard feeling in your body and mind
agent: It is very important that you take care of yourself and are not left alone with the difficulty
Consumer: Yes
agent: We have a phone line 1202 24/7 and a WhatsApp line between the hours of 17 and 23 and you are welcome to contact us whenever you feel the need.
consumer: Sorry I spilled everything on WhatsApp. The conversation remains discreet, right?
agent: Of course the conversation is discreet and it's good that you spilled and vented, that's why we're here.
agent: Many applicants contact us repeatedly and not once. In addition to the psychological treatment, we are here to hold the difficulty together
consumer: How many participants are there usually in the groups?
consumer: And who guides the group? Qualified nannies?
agent: I don't know how many are in the group and who are the facilitators. I will ask that they get back to you and give you details
consumer: ok
consumer: And do you have any idea if there is viewing for the group in the evening? I see it's morning
agent: I don't know if there is a group in the evening in general and there is currently nothing planned
consumer: Okay, thanks
agent: Thanks for sharing with me. I write to This is to get back to you regarding the group. Be aware that it may take some time
consumer: ok thanks

consumer: Hi, I need help. I wanted to seek legal advice regarding a divorce from a violent spouse
Consumer: Yes
agent: Good evening, I'm here with you
consumer: Hi
I wanted to ask what I should do to get legal advice regarding a divorce from an abusive husband
consumer: The violence is not physical but sexual, somewhat financial and emotional
agent: You have arrived at an assistance center for victims of sexual assault. It is possible to consult with our coordinator for criminal proceedings, in any case you should look for where you can get legal support for divorce proceedings
consumer: Is this something you help with?
agent: We do not help with divorce proceedings. Dealing with what you are going through, listening to you, and hearing how we can help you
agent: For divorce proceedings, it might be worth hiring a lawyer and go to a regular court. Not a rabbi
consumer: and consult with the coordinator is it possible?
agent: Absolutely possible. In which part of the country do you live?
consumer: Zichron Ya'akov
agent: If you belong to the Haifa area, you can call the Haifa Assistance Center directly. The direct phone number of the Haifa North Assistance Center is 04-8641262
Their email is: syua.tkifaminit@gmail.com
consumer: Thank you
agent: If it suits you to call, this is the shortest and best way.
consumer: What hours is possible?
agent: You can call at any hour, if it suits you it's better in the morning

and consult with the coordinator is it possible?

transcriptAll:
consumer: Dear all hi 
Good day 
I prefer to write in English because its s easier for me to explain than in Hebrew. 
I am a little lost and confused and I need some help
My name is Miri,  I met a guy in January and we had a good feeling ( discussion, hobbies, etc ) 
It took 3 weeks till we meet and at the first date, I felt that we had a good attraction between us. We drank a coffee and he dropped me at home only but from the first appointment I felt that he wanted more but I stopped him , telling it is too soon and I am not this kind of woman and I mentioned from the beginning I want a serious relationship. The problem is that due to his job ( a position in the Defense forces ( we were not able to meet a lot, maybe once a month, but lots of messages and phone calls. The truth is that it was very difficult to combine relationships with those conditions but wanted to take a change and try. 
We wrote lots of messages and sometimes I felt he was so frustrated that he wrote me some very hot messages, that I am not used to but I said to myself its s because his far and works nights and days .. I  always was empathic with him and tried to understand all the time. 
So from January, we met once per month till May. After he tried to be more distant telling lots of work, and very busy but all the time he messaged me there were some sexually suggestive sentences … all the time trying to light the relationship. 
To be honest we never had sexual relationships, all the time we met it was kisses, some caress, and foreplay. 
However each time he became more and more demanding and sometimes showing some violence in the written messages and speaking ( like Sado maso connotation ) I was naive, I thought it was only words like a play game …. 
We did not meet since May and we did not in contact a lot till mid June. Just some messages, a few phone calls and that is all but I felt that he wanted to meet me again soon especially because my birthday is in July. 
Since me birthday dates and wished we started to speak more by phone and messages, but lots were late in the night due to his job ( he does not have a normal shift like us during everyday life ) .. 
Yesterday he called me very early at 6h30 am, telling me he wants to meet me as he was on the road to the north and he could stop to Tel Aviv. 
I said I do not want I am still sleeping it is early and I am tired, but he insisted because we did not meet a lot since May and i feel he was very very stubborn. He told me I just come a few minutes to say hello and happy birthday and I go 
I had a small worry inside me but I thought, I finally I know him and he was correct all the time even now I know he is a manipulator and it seemed to work on me ..A kind of narcissistic pervert  addict to sex ( but violent and aggressive sex) 
Finally, he came yesterday and called me to open the door.  ( I have an intercom )  but my neighbor at the same time went to work and she opened the door before I did .. 
He entered my home. And I just finished closing the door he kissed me aggressively and he carded me at the wall, and started to touch my chest…  I was in shock and I told him to stop it .. he did not listen to me .. and pushed me in the living room onto the sofa, and told me to sit down. 
At the same time, he called me a “ bitch “ and slapped me strongly … I cried because it hurt me .. I told him to stop and said, shut up. I want you to do a blow job …… now, and he grabbed my hair and my head till his sex and tell me to do a fellation. I cannot move he is very strong with more strength than me .. he approached my head near and I had to do it, he pushed it deeply on my throat, pushing on my head and pulling my hair ( I have long hair ) .. I cannot breathe and I could stop for a moment and he slapped me again …. He wanted to come in my mouth .and he climbed on me on top of the sofa to approach my mouth and to penetrate in my mouth, more strongly, aggressively, and deeply till the end ….. 
I felt humiliated, disappointed, lost … 
He finished, and said goodbye and went ……….
I did not realize yesterday about the fact, today I tried to understand how I felt bad, dirty, and also naive as I could believe him since the beginning, but the only goal was to be a sexual object ….
I could speak only to my sister about it but not in detail I wrote now .. she said it is sexual harassment and sexual attack … 
The fact I wrote it helped me because I have been suffering from chronic anxiety and I have a treatment for it this kind of fact could have bad consequences on my health. 
Thank you for listening and reading me. I needed it. 
I have to forget this nightmare. I do not know how but will succeed because I have to. 
Miri
